story:
Short Summary

Need in the World

In all corners of the world, there are people in need, people desperate to move their lives forward or find some semblance of progress. These are people who go without the things that we would call the necessities and struggle just to survive. To these people, things like books are luxuries. The world often looks to high-tech solutions for most things these days yet their need, may be best met with a low-tech solution. I feel a drive deep inside me to step up and make a difference in the world, acting as an agent for change any way that I can.     

 

A Vision of Change

My name is Gary Jones-Locke, originally from England, I have traveled extensively, visiting locations in the Middle East. The time that I spent there was informative for me, affording me a glimpse into where I could make most impact. I went on to build my own business on Amazon, processing more than a million books a month before bowing out due to out-of-control fees, and as I saw how frequently books were going to waste, I resolved to do something. There was an opportunity for good in all that disregard for our resources, and I was going to work it out one way or another.

My Idea – Libraries in a Can

Drawing on my experience and my passion, I am on a mission to re-purpose Shipping Containers and Millions of Books, saving all the best books to donate for the people who need books most. This may seem like a simple concept, but it will require serious planning and effort. Long-term, I am confident that my partner and I can make education more widely accessible than ever before, encouraging reading on a large scale in areas of the world where people can't get their hands on the books that they so desperately need.

                           

How It Works

Unfortunately, many books are going to waste, ending up in shredders and recycling plants at best. By collecting, sorting and packaging these books, we will use shipping containers that convert into fully functioning libraries in a matter of hours.

The children and adults who can benefit most from these books will be able to do so, inspiring them to learn and dream, perhaps motivating them to pursue careers as doctors, engineers, educators, and entrepreneurs.

The Impact

There are many benefits to Libraries in a Can.

This is something that will touch lives on multiple levels, creating positive opportunities for people who otherwise have few or none. We believe that education is the core to build responsible peaceful citizens. Desperate people in desperate situations are more likely to think radically out of despair. We believe Libraries In A Can brings opportunity and vision, with books.

Environmentally we are re-purposing and salvaging steel and paper that otherwise would rot or end up in landfills.

The Possibilities

Think about all the possibilities. Through books, we can carve out entire lives.

We can empower people in forgotten places to stand up and believe in themselves, to achieve literacy, to learn to hunger for information, to learn to grow, and to become better citizens of the world and resist negative influences. We are setting a ambitious goal of one library per month, doing whatever we can to help whomever we can.

What We Need & What You Get

Our goal through this campaign is to raise the funds necessary to launching Libraries in a Can. To establish our operations, we need to raise at least $100,000,  which will fund a self-sustaining operation, which is why we are turning to you. According to our calculations, our expenses will include a large facility where we can sort our the books and then package and        distribute Libraries In A Can.

With

$25,000 we can ship One Library

$50,000 we can ship Two Libraries

$75,000 we can ship Three Libraries

$100,00 we can ship Four Libraries

$200,000 we can ship 12 Libraries a year. At that point the operation becomes a profitable enterprise shipping Libraries in a Can into the future.

Risks & Challenges

The risks associated with launching Libraries in a Can are minimal. We are handling low-cost materials and shipping one-way, used containers, so it is unlikely that anyone is going to misappropriate our packages before they reach their intended destinations. We have opened and operated more than seventeen large buildings similar to the one that we need for sorting, preparation, and distribution, so we do not foresee any major challenges on that front either.

 In addition, we are partnering with NGOS (Non-Governmental Organizations) to administer the libraries from the shipping ports in the US to the Libraries final destination.

Other Ways You Can Help

In addition to making a monetary contribution to this campaign, you can show your support for what we are doing by sharing a link to this campaign with all your friends and family. Go ahead and post about Libraries in a Can on Instagram, LinkedIn, Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you frequent. The more people know about what we are doing, the smoother our launch will go.

We are also extending an open invitation to anyone who would like to volunteer for sorting and packing at our facility. There will be free Starbucks available!

We appreciate your support, and we thank you for your time.
story_txt:
Short Summary
Need in the World
In all corners of the world, there are people in need, people desperate to move their lives forward or find some semblance of progress. These are people who go without the things that we would call the necessities and struggle just to survive. To these people, things like books are luxuries. The world often looks to high-tech solutions for most things these days yet their need, may be best met with a low-tech solution. I feel a drive deep inside me to step up and make a difference in the world, acting as an agent for change any way that I can.     
 
A Vision of Change
My name is Gary Jones-Locke, originally from England, I have traveled extensively, visiting locations in the Middle East. The time that I spent there was informative for me, affording me a glimpse into where I could make most impact. I went on to build my own business on Amazon, processing more than a million books a month before bowing out due to out-of-control fees, and as I saw how frequently books were going to waste, I resolved to do something. There was an opportunity for good in all that disregard for our resources, and I was going to work it out one way or another.

story:
Learn more about the harm of the virus for more people, let you learn more about epidemic prevention!!!

 

 

简短的摘要

贡献者资助他们可以对自己信任的人充满热情的想法。这是本节中要做的一些事情：

  • 介绍您自己和您的背景。
  • 简要描述您的广告系列及其重要性。
  • 表达出哪些贡献者将帮助您实现目标。

记住，要简洁明了，但要与众不同。问问自己：如果有人停止在这里读书，他们准备贡献自己的力量吗？

我们需要什么和您得到什么

为人们更详细地分解：

  • 说明您需要多少资金以及资金的去向。保持透明，专一的人需要信任您才能为您提供资金。
  • 告诉人们您独特的待遇。让他们兴奋！
  • 如果您没有达到自己的全部目标，请描述资金的去向。

影响

随意解释有关您的广告系列的更多信息，并让人们知道他们的贡献将产生的变化：

  • 解释为什么您的项目对贡献者和整个世界都很有价值。
  • 指出您在类似项目中的成功记录（如果有的话）。
  • 使之成为真人并建立信任。

风险与挑战

人们重视您的透明度。通过洞察实现目标的过程中可能面临的风险和障碍，保持开放并脱颖而出。

  • 分享使您有资格克服这些障碍的条件。
  • 描述您解决这些挑战的计划。

其他方式你可以帮忙

有些人就是无能为力，但这并不意味着他们无能为力：

  • 要求人们说出话来，并为您的竞选活动制造噪音。
  • 提醒他们使用Indiegogo共享工具！

这就是全部。

story:
Short Summary

Hello Everyone! I'm Hairstylist/ Hair Enhancement Specialist Mimi Miller.  It has been my passion for 20 years now helping my Clients Love their Hair by educating them on organic alternatives to use at home when they leave the Salon,  not only for the health of their hair and scalp but for their bodies as well as safe for the environment.

It can be quite overwhelming researching the right things to put in your hair, how much product to use or what's the science behind which ingredients mixed together work well for your hair. Especially when you have to go to the store to get new products and suddenly forget what exactly you were supposed to be buying for your hair. Have you ever had that happen?

In addition to having the APP for quicker methods to help you manage your hair, my new book that will be released simultaneously "Amazing Hair Organically - The Secrets of Women with Beautiful Hair from around the World reveals the regimens, remedies and recipes used for centuries by women from India, Egypt, Asia, Central America, the Caribbean and even your grandmothers who made their own hair products.

According to American Hair Loss statistics 40 million women are losing they're hair yearly. More than half of those women are researching natural alternatives to treat hair loss, stop the shedding, repair damage  and ultimately grow their hair again. In addition to that Women with wavy, curly, coarse, or fine multi-textured hair are seeking various natural remedies to condition, restore, strengthen, and make their hair more manageable.


What We Need & What You Get

This Campaign needs your help with the basic Product Launch startup cost to implement the necessary  configurations of this type of APP.

The capital raised will go towards the design framework, specific layout standards for high quality assurance and to execute the requirements to  ensure ease of use for multiple downloading and monthly updates for in house management to control and monitor its performance. Along with promotional videos for social media channels as well as marketing materials used at conventions.

The Perks to this unique campaign will get you expert advice, tips and steps to care for your hair without specifically by making healthier choices and how about those VIP and All Access Perks! You are one step closer to having a personalized consultation and hair care services customized to fit your particular hair care needs.

I have full faith that this awesome Campaign will not only reach it's goal but exceed  it because it is a really valuable tool for women to take the health of their hair back. However if Organa Hair Luv is not able to reach it's goal, the funds raised will still go towards the initial framework and cutting down the cost to get this project going. I will also seek other crowdfunding avenues. Help make this a success...

The Impact

With your contribution to this campaign the Organa Luv Hair App along with the Book  "Amazing Hair Organically - The Secrets of Women with Beautiful Hair from around the World."  will be able to help women and teens get back to healthy hair.

  • Real education from an Expert in hair loss and hair growth science.
  • Real tips and simple remedies to take care of your hair all from an APP on your phone
  • Repairing your hairs damage, renewing your hairs strength and restoring your hairs moisture and manageablity.

Risks & Challenges

The challenge will be to raise enough capital to package the APP for ease of use and maintain the monthly  quality assurance & functionality management it requires to assist in it's patronage by consumers.


Other Ways You Can Help

Of course I understand if you can not help at this time please share with friends and associates that you think would love to contribute to campaign.

  • Ask Friends, Family and Associates that might love to contribute to this campaign.
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools! I really do appreciate your support.

story:
Dear: Sir/Madam

Indlondlo Zulu Dancers Cultural And Art Centre seeks progressives sponsorship towards a Indlondlo Cultural Village tourist attraction in the Mkhambathini Community in Cato Ridge area. It is a registered non profit organization (Reg 151-983NPO) and has a tax exemption in South Africa.

Background of the potential village

The village will belong to Indlondlo Zulu Dancers. Since this village being an idea (which is very inspiring), we are aiming of gathering the local talents and acts to perform and thus creating an awareness of the village whereby the community will know of our existences and know that we encouraging the heritage of South Africa and getting the general public to participate since the youth is influenced much by the western lifestyle and norms. This in turn creates job opportunities for +-100 people.

Description of the village

The village will be a traditional zulu setting homestead which includes structures such as huts with thatcher roofing, flooring which is cow dung (just to name a few). The village will consist of sleeping quarters for tourists wishing to stay. There will be a showcasing section which will have a seating area for 50 people, within this section we will provide zulu dancing lessons, indigenous games, sick fighting and beadwork lessons. A section for stalls where people will be selling traditional Attire as well as beadwork (souvenirs). There will be a section located for plantation (farming) and near it will be a section where clay pots will be moulded. Lastly there will be a kraal in the center of the village which will have cattle. The village is to be located in Ophokweni, Manyavu near Cato Ridge area. There are about over 20 locals supporting the concept and are enthusiastic due to possible job creation. The majority of the acts and employees will be locals from the Cato Ridge area. Th e location is situated near a dam therefore we will provide river cruises and offer traditional meals for the tourists on site.

The ultimate mission of Indlondlo Zulu Dancers is to get tourist to visit them as we have toured many parts of the world and people plead to come visit us. So the event is a litmus test whether the village has a pedigree to fulfil the mission. This village has the best quality zulu dance performers hence we have travelled the world doing tours and the National Lotteries Commission has in principle funded many of our tours internationally as Indlondlo Zulu Dancers. The agreement between the National department of Arts and Culture is yet to be signed

The objectives of the village

•    To offer the uniqueness of our zulu heritage and a platform for zulu dancers to showcase their God given talent

•    To foster and maintain strategic partnerships.

•    To entertain tourists and locals .

To date, we have not secured no financial support from any organization or individual towards the village. We kindly request you to partner with us in making this village a success by being one of the sponsors. Golden opportunity exists for business to enhance their branding growth and contribute to the village tourist attraction venue. For business to seize this opportunity, we request any financial sponsorship and assistance to reach our ultimate target of $2 000 000. The same $2 000 000 will help build and sustain the village for a projected two years thereafter, the village will be able to fund itself.  One believes that for the kind of benefits, this requested is proportional and fair.

The above named zulu dance group, is seeking progressive partnership. Our existence is inspired by desire to contribute to broader development agenda of tourist internationally, locally and governmental people through heritage and Ubuntu. We aim to develop, retain and excel and enable our village to participate in prestige and or high level of heritage based village.

This village opens up a window opportunity for business to participate and benefit through Corporate Social Investment initiative. One would like urge our business potential to make use of this opportunity.

Benefits for strategic partners (sponsors)

The  relationship  between  our  strategic  partners  and  Indlondlo Zulu Dancer should be based on the following underpinning values.

•    Mutual respect

•    Honest

•    Accountability

•    Transparency

 

The real benefits

1.    Return on Investment

2.    Branding rights

3.    TV Coverage and radio coverage

4.    Corporate Social Investment contribution

We hope our request finds your favorable consideration and willing to discuss this deal further. Thank you in advance for positive response.

Thanking you in anticipation.

Yours Sincerely

Mr. Msizeni Mngadi

Director and founder of Indlondlo Zulu Dancers

Email: info@indlondlozuludancers.com

Website: www.indlondlozuludancers.com

story:
About SNDhaiti

Sons and Daughters of Haiti is a (501c3) non-profit corporation established with the single goal of improving the standard of living for Haitian people. Our board consists of a diverse group of men and women who are committed to making a positive difference in Haiti.

What We Do

Haiti is a nation with a gorgeous landscape; blessed with the triple threat of beautiful beaches, breath-taking mountains and thick and lustrous forestry. Haiti was the first black nation to gain its independence in 1804. Its main exports were sugar and coffee and many great nations fought to have this land as their own. Over time this nation has fallen from decades of abandonment, corruption, illiteracy, natural disasters and poor leadership.

The 2010 earthquake that shook the tectonic plates over which Haiti sits and the recent restoration of Haiti’s democratic government may prove to be the potential springboard for the socioeconomic revival of this once great nation. This is where Sons and Daughters of Haiti comes in; our goal is to:

  • Find opportunities to serve within Haiti and fund projects that aim to improve the environment, create job opportunities and highlight the beauty and riches of our country
  • Connect individuals and organizations who have project ideas for Haiti with investors who can fund these projects
  • Re-invest funds from membership dues, donations and apparel sales into the community by sponsoring health fairs, sports and recreational activities for the youth and environmental wellness projects

Why We Do It

In 2014 we had an unfortunate experience with a fraudulent investor and as a result were unable to complete a project we had undertaken in Haiti. During this trying time we learned a few lessons:

  • Developing a project requires a lot of time, dedication and planning
  • Finding funding to complete a project is difficult!… especially in a developing country due to concerns about economic instability
  • Banks are unwilling to invest in a project if 50% or more of required funds are not available

Although the experience was difficult, the lessons learned led to our decision to create a portal that would connect individuals and organizations who have project ideas with vetted investors who can provide financial support for these projects. Furthermore, we thought to ourselves, who better to reach out to than the sons, daughters and friends of Haiti. Together, we are a force to be reckoned with. We know that the journey will not be easy and the heights that we will reach will not be attained by sudden flight but we plan to toil upwards until our dream of a better Haiti is a reality. Together We Rise… Ayiti Cheri.

Project Introduction

Why an athletic training and recreational park?

The purpose of this park is two- fold…

Athletic training: With the completion of the 2016 Olympic Games in which Haiti continued with its 84-year long drought (with no medal), Haiti’s dire need for a center where the Haitian athletes can train has been magnified. Unlike many other Caribbean islands that have affiliations with developed nations allowing them access to superior training facilities and personnel, Haiti does not have any such affiliation and unfortunately lacks a national facility or center where the Haitian athletes are able to train. We want to change this! … We want to be a center that provides a world class training facility to the hard working and dedicated athletes in Haiti who have committed their lives to excellence in their sport.

Recreational Park: As technology advances and invades every facet of our lives we need to make every effort to ensure that we and our children spend time outside. It is our responsibility to live active and healthy lives so that we can teach our children the importance of this. Also, what better way to encourage the youth to aspire to greatness; playing side by side with training athletes will hopefully serve this purpose.

Programmatic Research

Benefits of Athletic Training and Recreational Parks:

  • Promote healthy habits and encourages an active lifestyle
  • Stimulate social interactions
  • Preserve green space
  • Provide athletes access to training facilities
  • Reduce crime
  • Create opportunity for recreation, exercise, therapy and education
  • Create income opportunities and economic development
  • Provide opportunity for intergenerational connections

Athletic training and recreational facilities add value to the communities they are established in. Not only do they enrich the environment and the lives of the community members by preserving greenspace and fostering active and healthy lifestyles respectively, they create opportunity for sports tourism and economic development.

Programs

Sports and Recreational programs

  • Fall – Soccer & Volleyball
  • Winter – Basketball & Tennis
  • Spring – Track/field, Wrestling & Swimming
  • Summer – Summer camps (multi-sports)

Sporting activities will be available for all genders and age ranges starting at age 4.

National and international tournaments will be held at the end of each season.

Health and Wellness programs

  • Will organize and host quarterly community health fairs
  • Personal trainers will provide clinics in weight lifting, nutrition and exercise techniques
  • A variety of health and wellness classes will be made available as needed

Budget

Phase 1: Site Acquisition

  • Negotiate with seller
  • Raise funds through donations or fund-raising activities
  • Acquire site
  • $718,740.00
  • $71,874 purchase related fees (10%)

Phase 2: Demolition/Clean-up

  • Hire demolition crew or recruit volunteers (possible in-kind donation)
  • Recruit members of community as partners
  • Utilize businesses to grow community partnerships
  • $10,000.00 (estimated value)

Phase 3: Develop as Available Funds Allow

*The above figures are a third-party quote from Shelterit Haiti. ShelterIT Haiti is a multi-national builder with offices in the US and Haiti. www.shelterit.com/

Land Value

The comparable current listings indicate an unadjusted price range of $1.68 to $4.93/square foot. The adjusted prices range of $0.94 to $1.80/square foot. We believe that these current listings are a good indication of the market value of the subject property. This is particularly so, considering that properties are sold in this market based on the best price the seller can get from the buyer without knowing the prices of the most recent sales. Based on all of the preceding data and analysis, our opinion of the market of the Fee Simple Estate of the subject, as of September 24, 2016 is $1.10/square foot. The Market Value for the 653400 square foot site is $1.10/square foot = $718,740.00

 

Rounded to:

Market Value, Fee Simple Estate, As Is – Land, as of September 24, 2016: $718,740.00

($718,740.00) (USD)
story_txt:
About SNDhaitiSons and Daughters of Haiti is a (501c3) non-profit corporation established with the single goal of improving the standard of living for Haitian people. Our board consists of a diverse group of men and women who are committed to making a positive difference in Haiti.What We DoHaiti is a nation with a gorgeous landscape; blessed with the triple threat of beautiful beaches, breath-taking mountains and thick and lustrous forestry. Haiti was the first black nation to gain its independence in 1804. Its main exports were sugar and coffee and many great nations fought to have this land as their own. Over time this nation has fallen from decades of abandonment, corruption, illiteracy, natural disasters and poor leadership.The 2010 earthquake that shook the tectonic plates over which Haiti sits and the recent restoration of Haiti’s democratic government may prove to be the potential springboard for the socioeconomic revival of this once great nation. This is where Sons and Daughters of Haiti comes in; our goal is to:
Find opportunities to serve within Haiti and fund projects that aim to improve the environment, create job opportunities and highlight the beauty and riches of our country
Connect individuals and organizations who have project ideas for Haiti with investors who can fund these projects
Re-invest funds from membership dues, donations and apparel sales into the community by sponsoring health fairs, sports and recreational activities for the youth and environmental wellness projects
Why We Do ItIn 2014 we had an unfortunate experience with a fraudulent investor and as a result were unable to complete a project we had undertaken in Haiti. During this trying time we learned a few lessons:
Developing a project requires a lot of time, dedication and planning
Finding funding to complete a project is difficult!… especially in a developing country due to concerns about economic instability
Banks are unwilling to invest in a project if 50% or more of required funds are not available
Although the experience was difficult, the lessons learned led to our decision to create a portal that would connect individuals and organizations who have project ideas with vetted investors who can provide financial support for these projects. Furthermore, we thought to ourselves, who better to reach out to than the sons, daughters and friends of Haiti. Together, we are a force to be reckoned with. We know that the journey will not be easy and the heights that we will reach will not be attained by sudden flight but we plan to toil upwards until our dream of a better Haiti is a reality. Together We Rise… Ayiti Cheri.Project IntroductionWhy an athletic training and recreational park?The purpose of this park is two- fold…Athletic training: With the completion of the 2016 Olympic Games in which Haiti continued with its 84-year long drought (with no medal), Haiti’s dire need for a center where the Haitian athletes can train has been magnified. Athletic training and recreational facilities add value to the communities they are established in. Not only do they enrich the environment and the lives of the community members by preserving greenspace and fostering active and healthy lifestyles respectively, they create opportunity for sports tourism and economic development.ProgramsSports and Recreational programs

story: Last year when I was a freshmen at college I spent Thanksgiving alone in my dorm room eating a bag of Cheetos while most of my peers had a large turkey dinner awaiting them at home in various locations around the United States. I bet you're wondering why I chose Cheetos to be my thanksgiving dinner. Home for me is across the Atlantic in a city called Haifa in the north of Israel, so I stayed in my dorm room for economic purposes. Though a friend of mine invited me to spend Thanksgiving in DC but ticket prices are only getting higher. This is my only chance to experience mashed potatoes and turkey so let me help you help me in making this dream of an international student happen. All the extra money that I don't use for airfare will go to a good cause.

story:
Tobby Vision Computers is a Technical Vocational Education Training Centre located in Bambui, Tubah Sub Division, Mezam Division – North West Region of Cameroon. It was founded by Cornelius Tawong on the 9th of February 2002 to train youths, farmers and students around Bambui on the use of computers/ICTs. It also provides computer services to the Major Seminary in Bambui, National Polytechnic Bambui, and the University of Bamenda.

Students and farmers of ages twelve years and above have been enrolled here and undergone training with us since 2002 either for a three–month, six–month or nine–month computer training course or for our computer summer holiday classes. 

Entrepreneurship: Most students from Tobby Vision Computers instead of waiting to write competitive entrance examinations to public schools to have white collar jobs with the government, are well equipped for the job market since they are being recruited directly by the private sector. Some open up computer booths to serve the higher institutions of learning around and others are teachers and designers.

Innovation: Our innovation is to use Information and Communication Technologies (ICTs) to improve the manual tools of the entire community with digital equipment. We are changing their mentalities from the use of crude tools to modern ones. And this change is having a very positive impact on their day-to-day lives.

Empowerment: Self-employment is our foremost preoccupation. Many of our graduates are opening their own computer booths and repair shops after being trained by our organization. We empower people with knowledge to use it in empowering themselves and others. During their internship, our students gain writing skills through team work, and this prepares them to either become future writers or publishers.
Your drops will be gathered to purchase three second hand computers, three tables, three computer room sitting chairs and internet connection to facilitate teaching/learning processes for students at Tobby Vision Computers Technical, Vocational Education Training School.

story:
Why it's important

Seeing the children's face after visiting the museum makes this all worth it for Lakota Dream. During our time open, we believe we have made a strong statement about who the Lakota People are and why this museum is not here to offend, but to create a beautiful democracy between communities to create something powerful. With new exhibitions, and renovation to the museum, we can continue to change life's and teach the true history about the Lakota People. 

 

The Impact

Any contribution we receive will make the biggest impact and go towards the growth of the Lakota Dream Museum. 

One exhibition specifically is a space in the museum representing the board school era. Many children were taken from their family and lost through the boarding school system. In Rapid City, many families mourn till this day, we will have a space where their families can pray and honor their loved ones.

Olympic Gold Medalist "Billy Mills" at the Lakota Dream Museum

 

Grand Opening of the Lakota Dream Museum

Keep the Dream Alive.

Thank you.

story:
Who We Are

I have been building robots for years hoping that I can create something special for myself. Along the way, I realized that there are not very many resources out there for someone who wants to build something more than just a fancy RC car. Ever since then, I have been documenting my progress into numerous videos and lecture style PDFs and PowerPoints.

I have built something pretty amazing in the process and I want you to experience something totally incredible. BERT is beyond a toy. He can be practical with personal assistant applications and he is very comfortable in a classroom environment. 

I am a Husband, a father, and a student, so it means a lot to me to make this a reality. I have worked hard to get where I am today and tomorrow I plan on working harder. That's part of having big dreams for me and my family!

We need your support to get the our first orders out the door. I have been in contact with suppliers and have built the robot and curriculum. Now I need your help to get this out the door so you can start building the robot you have been wanting!

What We Need & What You Get

We hope to sell our first batch of kits to raise at least $10,000. This will help us get:

  • Components for campaign kits and kits for the future.
  • Extra help to fulfill orders and refine the design and look of both hardware and software
  • And with enough help, I can finally start building robots somewhere other than our bedroom. Trust me, my wife will really thank you for that!
  • But the bottom line is that I have had the dream of starting a robotics company ever since I was a kid. With a name like Gearhart, why not? Your support will give me the boost I need to make my dream a reality and to get awesome education kits out in this world, because BERT is too awesome for me to keep for myself!

For your contribution you can receive:

  • $1-10 You get a BIG thank you from me and my family and a mention in our Thank You video at the end of the campaign along with a mention at the end of our PDF that is included with the Education package.
  • $25 gets you a super cool T-shirt designed by us! Pick your favorite!
  • $599 -$629 Gets you your very own BERT with all components needed and the full detailed Education Package! You will be thanked in our PDF and Thank You video.
  • $150 Gets you just the Education Package and the parts list. This is perfect if you already have the parts needed or have your own way of getting them. If you are an advertiser, for this price you can send me a flyer and I will print it out and stick it in with every shipment I make through this campaign. If I reach my goal, that deal is still valid with the InDemand purchases!
  • $2500 is the mega Educator's Package that comes with 5 BERTs and 5 Education Packages, ready to go, each on their own flash drive. Plus you will forever have our gratitude for helping us get started! 

 

Risks & Challenges

I'm not going to say this is all going to be rainbows and butterflies. I am working to consolidate my component sources as much as possible so I don't have as many things looming with the possibility of failing. Obviously, if I don't sell enough kits, I wont be able to buy in bulk enough to bring the price down, but I will be aggressive to ensure we get the best prices from our suppliers.

I am working on my second degree in manufacturing engineering. I am comfortable with manufacturing and what it takes to get a product from concept to product, but I also need your support. With that, we can overcome these challenges and get BERT out to see the world!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, no worries! But if you understand and like what I'm trying to accomplish here, it would mean the world to me and my family if you would share this campaign and help get the word out. I don't have much money to put into this project, so word of mouth is what I'm relying on! 

All About BERT

 

Arduino + Raspberry Pi = BERT

BERT uses the Raspberry Pi and Arduino schematics because of their huge support and community along with being very cost efficient and easy to use. Because of the amazing work these two companies have done, robots like BERT are able to happen at an affordable price. Along with our dozens of hours of video content, PDF and PowerPoint lectures, you get our customer support AND the support of thousands of tinker lovers online through these two powerful communities. Nothing about BERT is a secret. Nothing is proprietary. We explain every single detail in an organized fashion because our number one goal is to get the robots we have all been waiting for into the hands of the curious. What you do with BERT is up to you.

Stacked Up for Competition

His height is one of the many things that sets him apart from the rest. With the arm positioned at 40" above the floor, you are able to interact with things on tables and counter tops. He is more than just a talking robot.

 

Now You Really Can Be Two Places At Once

BERT can do Telepresence. He shows you how to build an HTML webpage for local access to his camera and all of his motors. This allows you to remotely control BERT over WiFi with full control of his arm and navigate around an area. You also get his video feed and are able to pan and tilt 180 degrees to look around and see where you are going. You can be anywhere within your network's WiFi range and control BERT.

 

These Were the Objects You Were Looking For

His camera also has another function; He is able to look down and see objects on tables and use that coordinate information to move the arm to that x,y location and grab the object.

 

Mapping the Bitmap

BERT uses a x,y coordinate system to plot his location in space. He makes it visual by plotting onto a bitmap. Imagine it like this: BERT starts at 235,54, which is his home location at the charger and is told to move to predetermined location set as "THE COUCH", which is at 88, 693. He then takes the shortest path there, utilizing the encoders that track his distance traveled and the digital compass that tells him what degree he is facing. The 8 ultrasonic sensors act like an invisible force field so he doesn't run into anything along the way.

 

BERT is Also Your New Computer

BERT is equipped with a Rapberry Pi 3 Model B with Raspbian OS installed. This is a version of Linux that is capable of almost everything you can do with a traditional PC. This allows for BERT OS to run, but also you can use Raspbian to do things like send email, surf the web, and even play Minecraft!

story:
Do you know how UBER drivers make money?

ONLY a car and driving skill is needed. 

Are you a native English speaker and have a smart phone? You’re the one I am looking for.

You can be a reader and that is what you will do in one session (10 minutes):
READ the sentences to a learner.
LISTEN while a learner is practicing. 
CORRECT pronunciation or intonation.
RECORD the sentences and send those to a learner. 
GET PAID 

It’s super easy and simple. You can work on your own schedule. 
No homework and no preparation is required to teach. 
You can turn your free time into cash and meet people from all over the world by becoming a reader.

You're too busy to be a reader? Then why don't you introduce DalTalk to you parents or your children? Any native speakers can be a reader.

I want to build an English speaking solution("DalTalk”) like UBER.

There are 2 Billion people who are learning English, lots of them stay at beginner level.
There might be several reasons why they can’t jump to intermediate level. But I think the main reasons are the following:
Their pronunciation and intonation is not ideal and  it’s hard to make a full sentence when speaking.
Native speakers don’t understand what they are saying right away.
Many of them are shy and it makes them uncomfortable if they fail to make a conversation.
The majority don’t like questions that they can’t answer easily.  (Ex. “What did you do last weekend?” or “What’s your opinion?”)
They want to escape the situation and try to avoid native speakers and it makes the learning harder. (But in their mind they still want to be fluent in English.)

So what is the solution here. It’s simple but hard to execute.
   Practicing full sentences hundreds times with proper pronunciation and finally memorizing them.

But repetition can become boring whatever it is.
This is what the learners should do:
Select sentences they want to memorize.
Choose a native speaker to study with.(out of man, woman, kids, young, old, USA, England, Canada …)
Listen carefully while the native speaker is reading the sentences.
Read the sentences back ten times and get feed-back on the pronunciation while practicing.
Receive voice recordings of words and sentences they need to practice for one minute and record them to send back.
    Practice again same sentences with other native speakers until they can fluently speak full sentences without any difficulty.

 


Do you want to make a living via DalTalk?

To be honest, it can be extremely hard make big money only as a reader. Becoming a reader will be good for an individual who have free time on his or her hands for small income.
I believe to make a living one needs to dedicate themselves to DalTalk, but there is limit to what reader can do. 
Other option will be to become a manager. All learners and readers are assigned to managers.
What is the role of the manager? It's to motivate the learners study more and connect them with the readers. Manager receives a fee when they sing up people to study. The more they study, the more you earn. Even when you are asleep.

Who am I?

I am a entrepreneur who dedicated myself to learning language.

My first step is solving reading issue for language learners and releasing an application named DalRead for iOS and Android.
When you read foreign language book you definitely need a dictionary. The problem is that looking up words slows your reading and finally makes you give up.
You might think “Am I reading a book or a dictionary?”.
But DalRead adds definition right after the difficult words only. So you don’t have to waste time to looking them up.
My target languages are English, Chinese and Japanese. It's especially useful when you read Chinese or Japanese articles. (I need to upgrade dictionary though)
 
My next step is solving speaking issues for beginner learners. 
I've tested this method 4 months and I can speak Chinese with those sentence I have studied. I have no excuse to not speak well when I have practiced those long and difficult phrases for  over hundred times. Most of the Chinese readers speak only Chinese and my Chinese level is not enough to make a conversation but it is not a problem. We don’t have to involve in the conversation when we can just read sentences and listen.


This solution is ready to be build, however we are short of Readers to launch this solution. Please join DalTalk as a reader or manager in early stage.
Thanks.
story_txt:
Do you know how UBER drivers make money?
ONLY a car and driving skill is needed. 
Are you a native English speaker and have a smart phone? You’re the one I am looking for.
You can be a reader and that is what you will do in one session (10 minutes):READ the sentences to a learner.LISTEN while a learner is practicing. CORRECT pronunciation or intonation.RECORD the sentences and send those to a learner. GET PAID 
It’s super easy and simple. You can work on your own schedule. No homework and no preparation is required to teach. You can turn your free time into cash and meet people from all over the world by becoming a reader.
You're too busy to be a reader? Then why don't you introduce DalTalk to you parents or your children? Any native speakers can be a reader.
I want to build an English speaking solution("DalTalk”) like UBER.
There are 2 Billion people who are learning English, lots of them stay at beginner level.There might be several reasons why they can’t jump to intermediate level. But I think the main reasons are the following:Their pronunciation and intonation is not ideal and  it’s hard to make a full sentence when speaking.Native speakers don’t understand what they are saying right away.Many of them are shy and it makes them uncomfortable if they fail to make a conversation.The majority don’t like questions that they can’t answer easily.  (Ex. “What did you do last weekend?” or “What’s your opinion?”)They want to escape the situation and try to avoid native speakers and it makes the learning harder. (But in their mind they still want to be fluent in English.)
So what is the solution here. It’s simple but hard to execute.   Practicing full sentences hundreds times with proper pronunciation and finally memorizing them.
But repetition can become boring whatever it is.This is what the learners should do:Select sentences they want to memorize.Choose a native speaker to study with.(out of man, woman, kids, young, old, USA, England, Canada …)Listen carefully while the native speaker is reading the sentences.Read the sentences back ten times and get feed-back on the pronunciation while practicing.Receive voice recordings of words and sentences they need to practice for one minute and record them to send back.    Practice again same sentences with other native speakers until they can fluently speak full sentences without any difficulty.
 

Do you want to make a living via DalTalk?
To be honest, it can be extremely hard make big money only as a reader. Becoming a reader will be good for an individual who have free time on his or her hands for small income.I believe to make a living one needs to dedicate themselves to DalTalk, but there is limit to what reader can do. Other option will be to become a manager. All learners and readers are assigned to managers.What is the role of the manager? It's to motivate the learners study more and connect them with the readers. Manager receives a fee when they sing up people to study. The more they study, the more you earn. Even when you are asleep.
Who am I?
I am a entrepreneur who dedicated myself to learning language.
My first step is solving reading issue for language learners and releasing an application named DalRead for iOS and Android.When you read foreign language book you definitely need a dictionary. The problem is that looking up words slows your reading and finally makes you give up.You might think “Am I reading a book or a dictionary?”.But DalRead adds definition right after the difficult words only. So you don’t have to waste time to looking them up.My target languages are English, Chinese and Japanese. It's especially useful when you read Chinese or Japanese articles. (I need to upgrade dictionary though) My next step is solving speaking issues for beginner learners. I've tested this method 4 months and I can speak Chinese with those sentence I have studied. I have no excuse to not speak well when I have practiced those long and difficult phrases for  over hundred times. Most of the Chinese readers speak only Chinese and my Chinese level is not enough to make a conversation but it is not a problem. We don’t have to involve in the conversation when we can just read sentences and listen.
This solution is ready to be build, however we are short of Readers to launch this solution. Please join DalTalk as a reader or manager in early stage.Thanks.

story:
With the Monarch Butterfly survival kit​ young scientists will learn the basic concept of Electronics, Robotics and Electricity by building a Solar Powered Robotic Butterfly that flaps its wings using muscle wires (AKA shape memory metal alloy) and a circuit based in the popular (and young engineer’s favorite) 555 timer chip.

They will also learn about the importance of Gender Equality in STEM fields. Ruby, the main character in the instructional comic book, is a supper smart nine-years-old nature lover and a science enthusiast that will guide us step-by-step with the help of STEM heroines such as Rachel Carson, Alice Hamilton and Jane C. Wright among others. 

Parts included on the "Monarch Butterfly Survival Kit"

Once your kids get their kit at home they will:

  1.  Piece together the Robotic Butterfly
  2. connect it to the Solar Panel to Power it
  3. Assemble the circuit that controls the flapping action of the butterfly
  4. Put the Milkweed seeds to germinate in the Tin Box 
  5.  Wait few weeks and transplant the seeds to a flower pot or garden outdoors and place the robotic butterfly by its side.

In order to assemble the circuit you will use, along with the step-by-step instructional comic, the  laser-cut cardboard pattern included in the kit that indicates using a alphanumeric grid system(as in a crossword puzzle) where each electronic component goes.

The next steps are; putting the milkweed seeds in the floral foam, Inserting the foam with the seeds in the tin box, water it and finally put the windowed lid back. You tin box turned into a Green house!

Make sure to put the tin box by the window, the seeds need a good amount of sunlight to germinate big and healthy. 

After few weeks the seeds are grown enough to be transplanted to a flower pot outside (your tiny plants love real yummy soil!) and since they don't need the greenhouse anymore  take your assembled circuit and solar panel and put them inside so they are protected from the rain and bad weather. 

everything is ready for the grand finale. Take your waterproof robotic butterfly, solar panel and circuit and put them by your Milkweed growing plants. In few weeks your Monarch Butterfly Sanctuary will be ready to receive the exhausting traveling monarch butterflies moms ready to lay their eggs by your window. 

The milkweed seeds included in the kit are prepared to germinate in the floral foam packaging inside the tin box. As you can see the tin box has three different functions; first it is the packaging that keeps your survival kit neat and protected until you receive it at home, then it serves as a temporary greenhouse for you to germinate the seeds and last it is the waterproof container that will protect your assembled circuit and the solar panel when you’re ready to put your butterfly outside.

 As you can see nothing gets discarded with this green-designed product.

 TAKE ACTION!

the Monarch Butterfly Survival Kit is a Do-It-Yourself assembling kit for the kids to have fun but also to learn to take action in favor of nature conservancy and gender equality at an early age. 

 
GENDER EQUALITY ON STEM FIELDS
 
When it comes to studying STEM subjects at school, girls and boys perform equally well. Unfortunately, this parity doesn’t always carry over into the professional world where there is a significant gender gap in the science and technology workforces today. Women hold only 27 percent of the jobs in computer science, and 14 percent in engineering.
 

"She Change STEM" Classroom Poster Series

 One reason is the lack of female role models in STEM fields to encourage more girls to study math and science. Many women are deterred from entering the STEM workforce due to outdated stereotypes that still exist today. From toys that are targeted at boys to portrayals of STEM professionals in the media, women are led to believe that there is no place for them in this field.

As parents we should work hard to encourage our children from a young age to follow their academic goals regardless of gender stereotypes and encourage them to follow their dreams.

20-page Instructional Comic included in the kit featuring Ruby as the main Character.

 With the “Monarch Butterfly Survival Kit” project I want to inspire girls in STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering and Math). The kit comes with a 20-page instructional comic in which Ruby (my Seven years old Daughter’s alter ego), a super smart and stubborn young scientist and tenacious guardian of nature determined to save the world one butterfly at a time, gives step-by-step instructions to complete the project.

ALL KIDS ARE NATURE LOVERS

"A true conservationist is a man who knows that the world is not given by his fathers but borrowed from his children." ~ John James Audubon

I do believe that now is more important than ever that we raise environmental awareness and develop eco-sustainable behavior in kids at an early age so they become the global environmental citizens of the future. I chose the Monarch butterfly for this kit because it plays a crucial role in our ecosystem and is in danger of extinction because of climate change and loss of habitat due to the use of pesticides for GMO crops.

decline of Monarch Population in the last 20 years

 

CASE STUDY (MAKE A CIRCUIT DIY KITS)

Two years ago I started an educational project called “The Wonderful World of Electronics” to introduce kids to STEM and to the Art of Electronics using a novel friendly format; DIY fun electronics experiments explained via comic strips.

The first line of products I created was the Make-A-Circuit DIY Kit; it comprised “The Sonic Drawing”, “Laser Theremin” and “Musical Fingers” kits.

Each kit came with all the parts needed for making three fun musical instruments. A comic strip starring Professor Scatterbrain, a nutty old-timer who is my ink-on-paper alter ego, and his sidekick, Multi, a multimeter low on battery and brainpower, gave step-by-step instructions on how to complete the circuits.
 
"Make A Circuit" DIY Electronic Kits
 
 There has been a lot of interest in these kits by educational institutions, with some of them incorporating the kits into their curriculums.

educational institutions currently using our "Make A Circuit" kits to teach electronics.

 And those who got the kit have also something to say about them.

“We purchased all three kits for 6th grade students in our summer art camp. They loved them. We handed off the kits to them and they were able to build the circuits by themselves, as the graphic novel handbook was engaging and accessible. We particularly like that the kits teach student how to build a circuit, step by step, using components that they will use in progressively more challenging projects. We plan on using them in a university art and technology course for the same reasons”  Cindy Maguire. New York

“All the various Professor Scatterbrain kits are brilliant. The comic book instructions are a work of art. Extremely educational yet still very artistic”, Robert McNeill, New York.

PROJECT TIMELINE

WHO AM I

My name is Federico Muelas and I’m the skipper of the crew that has been working for over a year to turn the “Monarch Butterfly Survival Kit” into reality.  

I have been teaching Electronics and Physical Computing for the last 12 years to students of all ages, from 7 to 70 years young. I mostly do my teaching at the School of Visual Arts in New York City (MFA Computer Art and Bachelor in Fine Art departments) but once in a while I’m invited to do workshops in others schools in the US and abroad. 

My teaching involves a great deal of subjects; coding, robotics, electronics, augmented reality, you name it, and everything we learn, we learn with hands-on fun exercises. I guess that’s why I’m always concocting for my students exciting educational tools like the “Monarch Butterfly Survival Kit”. 

I found out that using comics is a great method to introduce kids to any subject imaginable, even to complex ones like Electronics or Physical Computing 

I’m also a New Media Artist and when I’m not teaching or working on educational projects like this one I do my “own” artwork. 

In the following video you can see an example of what I do when I’m wearing my “artist hat”.

As you can see I love to mix advanced technology with traditional media in my work (nothing more exciting that mixing electronics and mud, right?) I guess that’s because although my undergrad was on traditional Fine Arts (you know, drawing, sculpture, painting, anatomy, etc.) in year 2000 I came to New York to study a Master In Computer Arts to specialize on Interactive Digital Technologies. 

The coolest thing about my art pieces is that they are so technologically complex that my team and I are the only ones who can set them up so when they want to have them in an art show they have to flight us over along with the piece. 

Not a bad way to travel the world. 

My Art Show Traveling Luggage

Also my work has also been honored with some awards, what makes me think that I may be doing something right.

story:
// Scroll down to read the campaign in English

 

Мојата животна приказна

Здраво!

Се викам Андреј и мојот сон е да бидам Тренер за Личен Развој. Се започна додека бев студент и јас бев многу несреќен. Бев толку разочаран за мојата иднина со што морав да донесам одлука за да најдам начин како да станам среќен и исполнет. Почнав да барам помош на интернет, и започнав да читам книги кои беа мотивациски  каде целото однесување и психологија беа објаснети и разберени. Најдов многу луѓе кои ја споделуваа нивната трансформација, и јас започнав да ги применувам нивните стратегии и знаење во мојот живот. Пронајдов многу трауми од моето детство и многу потиснати сеќавања што ги носев вo мене. Ми требаше 3 години од постојано учење и соочување со предизвици за да оздравам. Научив многу стратегии за да ја вратам контролата врз мојот живот и да направам секаква промена. Сега верувам дека можам да помогнам и да го подобрам животот на секој кој е подготвен да креира живот исполнет со многу љубов, среќа и успех. 

До мене е 

Посакувам да бев само јас што беше низ сето ова ... но вистината е ...  јас направив голема трансформација, прашав многу прашања, пробував и имав многу неуспеси, Поминав преку многу искуства од кои научив многу вредни лекции со кои го направив мојот живот да бидам среќен и успешен. 

 Чувствувам дека имам одговорност (и привилегија) да го споделам тоа што го научив со колку што е можно повеќе луѓе, бидејки знам колку голема разлика може да креирам за секој, кој поминува низ вакви предизвици и дека  секогаш може да најде начин како да го направи својот живот посреќен. 

До тебе е 

За започнување на кариера за личен развој потребно  $3000 . Сите средства се наменети  за отварање фирма, за креирање на мојата кариера на Тренер за Личен Развој, за опрема (камера компјутер итн.) и да инвестирам во маркетинг со кои можам да организирам работилница и семинари и да ги учам моите стратегии на многу луѓе во светот. Бидејки сакам да обучувам многу луге ке треба цело време да ја се занимавам со оваа работа и  да ги покријам трошоците за сметки и  за станарина за следните 3-6 месеци.

 

Награди/Бонуси

Да  биде восхитувачко креирав 5 интересни награди за секое ниво на донација. 

Можеш да избереш по една од овие награди, започувајки со $9 за мала е-книга се до една година контакт за $299 која верувам дека ќе ти го промени животот целосно (разгледај ги сите награди во десната колона).

Омилена од сите ми е 2 часа лична консултација онлине, или во живо ако си од Македонија или соседните држави каде јас ке ти поставам неколку прашања и ке се фокусирам на статегии и алатки кои можат да ти го сменат животот целосно. 

Јас досега имам многу искуство во работа со луѓе и комплетна промена и подобрување на нивниот личен и професионален живот. Чуствувам дека многу луѓе уживаат во разговори со мене, и јас верувам дека е поради тоа што секогаш сум искрен и автентичен. Јас сум восхитен  да имам прекрасна консултација тебе ако одлучиш да избереш еден од последните 3 подароци. 

Завршни зборови

Подржувајки го овој проект ке помогнеш на многу луѓе да креираат значаен живот, највеќе на сите луѓе кои живеат во анкциозност и траума исто како што јас бев, а исто така со донирање на последните 3 подароци од десната страна  и ако ги примениш овие алатки што ги научив овие две-три години твојата среќа и исполнетост е загарантирано. Не само тоа но кога ќе ги имам потребните пари мојата иднина е исто така загарантирана за да го живеам мојот сон и да достигнам до колку што е можно повеќе луѓе. Мојата визија е да организирам семинари и работилници и да работам со луѓе , бидејки кога јас излечам еден во публиката и другите можат да се излечат истовремено. Секој е повеќе од добредојден за да биде дел од ваква емоционална атмосфера. Бидејки научив добро да зборувам Англиски јазик мојот сон во иднина е да им помагам на лугето на светско ниво и да ги охрабрувам да превземат контрола врз нивната судбина. 

Ризици и Предизвици

Како и секој проект, има секогаш непредвидливи ризици кои можат да се создадат заради различни причини кои не се под моја контрола вклучувајки го мојот личен живот или некоја непланирана случка. Како и да е јас сум многу самоуверен  и сум снаодлив за да се справам со секаков вид на предизвици кои можат да излезат додека трае процесот.  Ке бидам искрен, транспарентен за секој можен предизвик и ке ве информирам за се што се случува.

И ако сакаш да ми помогнеш, но неможеш да донираш тоа е супеееер! 

Можеш исто така да помогнеш со споделување на твоите другари или роднини да ја пришират оваа прекрасна кампања!

Само можеш да го споделиш овој линк((https://goo.gl/TXTkyZ) на твоите социјални мрежи и да ми помогнеш да го проширам зборот. Или кликни на иконите на врвот на страната за да споделиш сега! Ако си блогер или некој со голема заедница, јас би сакал да се запознаеме и да направиме поголемо позитивно влијание. 

 

Ако имаш некакви прашања и коментари слободно можеш да ми пишеш на мојата е-маил адреса andrej.mircevski.94@gmail.com

///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

My Life Story 

Hey!

My name is Andrej, My dream is to be a Personal Development Coach. Everything started when I was on college and I was very unhappy, I was so desperate about my future and I had to make a decision that I must find a way to feel more happy and fulfilled. I started to search online, and started reading books that was motivational and materials where all behavior and psychology of the people was understood. I found many people who were sharing their transformation and I started applying their strategies and knowledge in my life. I discovered a lot of trauma from childhood and many suppressed memories that I was carrying inside me. It took me 3 years of constant learning and facing  challenges to heal. I learned many tools and strategies to take control of my life and make any change that i wanted. Now i believe that i can help and improve the life of any person who is ready to create life filled with love, happiness and success.

It's up to me

I wish I could say that I'm the only one who went thought this... but the truth is... I  did a lot of transformation work, asked a lot of questions, tried and failed a lot. I learned many valuable lessons from many experiences that transformed my life completely.

I feel it is my responsibility (and privilege) to share what I learned with many people in the world, because I know what a profound difference it can make for anyone  who is going thought similar challenges and then they can realize all the opportunities and possibilities this life opens up for them.

And it's up to you 

For launching my Coaching career I need  $3000 and all the money
are going to fund my costs for the company that i'm starting, buy new equipment (laptop, camera, etc), invest in marketing with which I can organize workshops and seminars to teach my skills to many people in the world. Because i love to teach many people i must to coach people full time and i also need to cover my monthly costs for housing and bills for next  3-6 months 

 

Rewards/PERKS

To be more exiting, I created 5 cool rewards for any level of contribution.

 You can choose any of these rewards, starting with $9 for a basic e-book, all the way to One Year contact for $299 which I believe will change your life completely (see all the rewards on the right-side column).

One of my favorite is 2 hours consultation where I will have online or live, one on one personal consultation with you, ask you a few questions and focus on improving your live and develop strategies that i believe can change your life forever. 

I already have many experiences in working with people and completely changing and improving their personal and professional life. I feel that many people enjoy conversations with me, and i believe is because i'm always honest and authentic. I'm exited to have healing consultations with you if you decide to donate in one of the last 3 perks. 

 

Final words

Backing up this project will create meaningful life to many people, especially those who are living in anxiety and trauma just as i was, also with purchasing one of the perks and if you use the tools that i have learned during the last 3 years, your happiness and fulfillment is guaranteed. Not only that but when I reach the goal of funds my future is also guaranteed to make even greater impact in many other people lives. My dream is to organize seminars and workshops and work  with people because when I heal one person, the others who are present can learn how to heal in the same time. Everyone  will be more than welcome to be part of such healing atmosphere. Because of my knowledge of speaking English my dream for the future is to help people worldwide and encourage them to take control of their destiny.

 

Risks & Challenges

As with any project, there are always unforeseeable risks that can arise due to a variety of factors beyond my control including my personal life and any unplanned event.  However,I'm confident in my ability and expertise to deal with any challenges that may arise during the process. I will be honest, transparent about any possible challenge and will keep you in a loop down the road..

 

And, if you'd like to help me out, but can't make a donation, that is oookay!

You can also help by reaching out to your friends and family to share this uplifting campaign!

Just share this page link (https://goo.gl/TXTkyZ) on your social media, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, anywhere and help me spread the word. Or click on the icons at the top of the page to instantly share. If you are a blogger or someone with a huge community, I would love to get together with you and make a bigger impact! 

If you have any questions or comments feel free to write me to my email: andrej.mircevski.94@gmail.com
story_txt:
// Scroll down to read the campaign in English
 
Мојата животна приказна
Здраво!
Се викам Андреј и мојот сон е да бидам Тренер за Личен Развој. Се започна додека бев студент и јас бев многу несреќен. Бев толку разочаран за мојата иднина со што морав да донесам одлука за да најдам начин како да станам среќен и исполнет. Почнав да барам помош на интернет, и започнав да читам книги кои беа мотивациски  каде целото однесување и психологија беа објаснети и разберени. Најдов многу луѓе кои ја споделуваа нивната трансформација, и јас започнав да ги применувам нивните стратегии и знаење во мојот живот. Пронајдов многу трауми од моето детство и многу потиснати сеќавања што ги носев вo мене. Ми требаше 3 години од постојано учење и соочување со предизвици за да оздравам. Научив многу стратегии за да ја вратам контролата врз мојот живот и да направам секаква промена. Сега верувам дека можам да помогнам и да го подобрам животот на секој кој е подготвен да креира живот исполнет со многу љубов, среќа и успех. 
До мене е 
Посакувам да бев само јас што беше низ сето ова ... но вистината е ...  јас направив голема трансформација, прашав многу прашања, пробував и имав многу неуспеси, Поминав преку многу искуства од кои научив многу вредни лекции со кои го направив мојот живот да бидам среќен и успешен. 
 Чувствувам дека имам одговорност (и привилегија) да го споделам тоа што го научив со колку што е можно повеќе луѓе, бидејки знам колку голема разлика може да креирам за секој, кој поминува низ вакви предизвици и дека  секогаш може да најде начин како да го направи својот живот посреќен. 
До тебе е 
За започнување на кариера за личен развој потребно  $3000 . Сите средства се наменети  за отварање фирма, за креирање на мојата кариера на Тренер за Личен Развој, за опрема (камера компјутер итн.) и да инвестирам во маркетинг со кои можам да организирам работилница и семинари и да ги учам моите стратегии на многу луѓе во светот. Бидејки сакам да обучувам многу луге ке треба цело време да ја се занимавам со оваа работа и  да ги покријам трошоците за сметки и  за станарина за следните 3-6 месеци.

 
Награди/Бонуси
Да  биде восхитувачко креирав 5 интересни награди за секое ниво на донација. 
Можеш да избереш по една од овие награди, започувајки со $9 за мала е-книга се до една година контакт за $299 која верувам дека ќе ти го промени животот целосно (разгледај ги сите награди во десната колона).
Омилена од сите ми е 2 часа лична консултација онлине, или во живо ако си од Македонија или соседните држави каде јас ке ти поставам неколку прашања и ке се фокусирам на статегии и алатки кои можат да ти го сменат животот целосно. 
Јас досега имам многу искуство во работа со луѓе и комплетна промена и подобрување на нивниот личен и професионален живот. Чуствувам дека многу луѓе уживаат во разговори со мене, и јас верувам дека е поради тоа што секогаш сум искрен и автентичен. Јас сум восхитен  да имам прекрасна консултација тебе ако одлучиш да избереш еден од последните 3 подароци. 
Завршни зборови
Подржувајки го овој проект ке помогнеш на многу луѓе да креираат значаен живот, највеќе на сите луѓе кои живеат во анкциозност и траума исто како што јас бев, а исто така со донирање на последните 3 подароци од десната страна  и ако ги примениш овие алатки што ги научив овие две-три години твојата среќа и исполнетост е загарантирано. Не само тоа но кога ќе ги имам потребните пари мојата иднина е исто така загарантирана за да го живеам мојот сон и да достигнам до колку што е можно повеќе луѓе. Мојата визија е да организирам семинари и работилници и да работам со луѓе , бидејки кога јас излечам еден во публиката и другите можат да се излечат истовремено. Секој е повеќе од добредојден за да биде дел од ваква емоционална атмосфера. Бидејки научив добро да зборувам Англиски јазик мојот сон во иднина е да им помагам на лугето на светско ниво и да ги охрабрувам да превземат контрола врз нивната судбина. 
Ризици и Предизвици
Како и секој проект, има секогаш непредвидливи ризици кои можат да се создадат заради различни причини кои не се под моја контрола вклучувајки го мојот личен живот или некоја непланирана случка. Како и да е јас сум многу самоуверен  и сум снаодлив за да се справам со секаков вид на предизвици кои можат да излезат додека трае процесот.  Ке бидам искрен, транспарентен за секој можен предизвик и ке ве информирам за се што се случува.
И ако сакаш да ми помогнеш, но неможеш да донираш тоа е супеееер! 
Можеш исто така да помогнеш со споделување на твоите другари или роднини да ја пришират оваа прекрасна кампања!
Само можеш да го споделиш овој линк((https://goo.gl/TXTkyZ) на твоите социјални мрежи и да ми помогнеш да го проширам зборот. Или кликни на иконите на врвот на страната за да споделиш сега! Ако си блогер или некој со голема заедница, јас би сакал да се запознаеме и да направиме поголемо позитивно влијание. 
 
Ако имаш некакви прашања и коментари слободно можеш да ми пишеш на мојата е-маил адреса andrej.mircevski.94@gmail.com

story:
Short Summary

We are an interdisciplinary team (engineers, designers, teachers) who seek through this project to improve learning skills in early childhood, so we will talk about BunnyCode below.

New technologies allow the development of new forms of learning, strengthening among other things: critical thinking, problem solving creativity, communications and cooperative work. Nowadays it is possible to acquire different types of robots and electronic tools that allow young children to get closer to the programming. Talking about the elements mentioned above, there are few products that offer tangible programming, because most of them base their functionality on tablets, and then, these are less convenient for the time of exposure to the screen.

BunnyCode is a self-learning kit for tangible programming for early childhood that will change the way children learn about the world. It has a wide set of instructions in blocks that make different programs when children join them to move the bunny to a specific place or use their sensors to recognize an obstacle, some noise or light, all this depending on the objective of the activity The objective of the product is to involve children with programming so that they acquire skills such as: laterality, eye-hand coordination, visual perception, abstract thinking and self-learning. Your help will allow us to continue with the development of this project, and will give us the opportunity to continue our journey.

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

It is a product of easy access, which is for self-learning, at an accessible price, greater functionality, it is tangible, the use of screens is avoided, it has a greater diversity of basic blocks for tangible programming and it involves parents and family in the process of learning

Well, our project development needs this amount of money:

Funding needed: $100.000 USD

However, if this campaign doesn't reach the needed funding, your contributions won´t be accepted and we will start again this campaign. Now, we'll explain in a general way in what the gathered funding will be invested:

  • Components
  • Raw materials and supplies
  • Desing
  • Fixed costs
  • Advertising
  • Taxes
  • Other expenses

Now, related to what you can get, we've created a complete set of unique perks, that you can obtain depending on the range of funding where you clasify. 

You can find more detailed information in - 3. Perks section.

The Impact

Programming is a useful skill in current times. Indeed, a high number of future jobs will be taken by people with programming abilities, regardless their major choice. That's why it is important to encourage children to think in a logical way, in order to achieve a goal/solve a problem, by programming.

Nevertheless, children aged between 3 and 6 found the learning process slightly different from older kids. We are aware of this fact; therefore the concept of tangible programming gets into scene. First of all, our product doesn’t rely in tablets, PC’s or any device with a screen, given that doctors recommend not to use them more than two hours per day for children between 4 and 8 years old. We want kids to have the opportunity of touching and arranging  blocks, in order to create a sequence; that action would give the bunny a path or command to carry out. This way makes easier the self-learning process we want kids aqcuire.

At this moment, we have developed a prototype, assessed its functionality and also, we were able to detect risks, challenges and potencial improvements for the future product. You can follow our progress in the Bunny's social networks and  website, and then, contribute to this project! 

 

Risks & Challenges

We know that risks and obstacles will be presented in the development of this project , for that reason it is important for us to let you know those facts through social media.

We are a interinterdisciplinary team (engineers, designers, teachers) with the skills and abilities to find solutions for any obstacle or risk in all the Project stages, this team has been selected in such a way that any trouble in any area will be resolved in the best way.

Also, there's the possibility that we can't achieve our contributing goal, in that way your contributions won't be accepted and we will start again this campaign.

Other Ways You Can Help

To be a contributor, you also can help us by sharing our main idea about self-learning and Tangible Programming for kids. This are our social networks, where you can easily share posts or comment :

  • Facebook: Bunny code
  • Twitter: @bunny_code
  • Instagram: bunnycodeproject

Our  website is : www.bunny-code.com, there you can find more information about this project.

Contribute with this project sharing our social networks and website, in that way more people would know us. Also, If you like our idea, you can use Indiegogo share tools to find more contributors.

 

For teachers: https://drive.google.com/open?id=1xbAlkr4tbBgYgsfmkBqeWBCtl4XhCDxx
