story:
Virtual to Real Capability for Cisco Labs

Move Your Cisco Configs from Virtual to Real Devices or from Real Devices to Virtual

 
 

About Leanides V2R Lab Station 

The Leanides V2R Lab Station is a project that I first thought of when I was thinking about  how I wish I could bring my GNS3 Cisco network labs into the real world. When I had studied the Cisco CCNA and CCNP courses, the virtual GNS3 labs that I did stayed in GNS3 and I would go to Uni and do labs with real Cisco devices and the two would never meet. What if I could save my GNS3 labs and roll them out to a real Cisco network lab on real devices? If I could do that I could work at home on the virtual GNS3 lab Sim and then roll out the lab at Uni on real Cisco devices and then save them and put them back onto GNS3 again at night.

To be able to do this would be amazing and free up a lot of time. I am pleased to announce that it is now finally possible and the software to do this is now available for anyone to use. 

I believe that the ability to do this will make doing Cisco network labs a lot more fun and productive and I hope that the Leanides V2R Lab Station will be a useful tool that will help you right through your course of study with Cisco Labs.

Why do I need it?

After doing many Cisco Labs and setting up countless Cisco devices in the workplace from scratch, I could see the need for a tool that would be able to quickly roll out network configurations to Cisco devices. The idea of a multi-purpose tool that could be of use at all levels of Cisco study evolved with time and the purpose was to develop something that is both useful and easy to use. One problem that has always persisted in the industry, is how to take a text file config and roll it out to a Cisco device. Anybody in the industry could relate to that challenge and I have worked on developing a faster and easier way than any of the alternatives that currently exist for deploying a config to a Cisco device. The product available with this  campaign is the culmination of that effort and I would like to see people get the benefits that it provides and also to see a community of people that can help to contribute suggestions and feedback that can ensure its continued development.

What it Does

The Leanides V2R Lab Station solves several problems and empowers the user with a higher level of functionality.

1. Transfer Configs from GNS3 to Real Cisco devices - It enables the user to transfer their Virtual GNS3 Cisco device configs to Real devices easily and also transfer the configs back from Real devices to Virtual GNS3 Lab devices.

2. A Repository for Cisco Lab Configs - It allows you to collect your Cisco Lab configs from GNS3 and Real device configs in the one place and be able to edit and deploy them easily.It also allows for easy revision by making re-deployment of past labs a breeze.

3. Reliable Backups - It ensures that your Virtual GNS3 Lab configs are able to be saved reliably on a separate platform to GNS3 (in cases where GNS3 does not reliably save your configs).

4. From text file to Device - It provides a fast and easy way to upload and transfer a text file config to a Cisco device.

5. Rapid Network Deployment - It enables several configs to be transferred to several devices at once, which speeds up the time that it takes to setup a Lab. eg. It would enable you to prepare multiple devices in a Lab environment for deployment by pushing configs to their startup config via telnet from the Lab Station GUI.

6. Rollback Capability for Cisco Devices - The V2R Lab station has rollback functions that allow saved configs to be rolled back to the running or startup configs of Cisco devices. This capability is not inherent with Cisco Routers and Switches and has now been made possible.

7. Store and Re-use your Network Change Scripts - Easy storage and access to change scripts. It allow you to store over 1000 macro scripts for changes to device configurations and provides a way to easily deploy them directly to Cisco devices.

Transfer Virtual Labs to Real Cisco devices

Transfer your Cisco configs from virtual labs in GNS3 to Real Cisco devices on either running or startup config or from real devices to GNS3 virtual labs.

Automated Device Discovery  

Fast and Easy to use Network Device Discovery - It can automatically locate your Cisco lab devices and load them into its settings.

 

Backup Configs - A Complete store house of all your Labs

Backup and Load Cisco configs on GNS3 or real devices as retrievable labs - you can either load a saved lab or upload configs and save them into a lab.

Deploy Configs - Zero Provisioning to Startup Config

Startup Configs can be rapidly deployed directly to Cisco devices on GNS3 Virtual or Real device Labs. You can load any saved config to any device quickly and easily.

Upload Text File Configs and Push them to Cisco Devices 

In the development of the Lab Station I have created a fast and easy way to push a text file config to a Cisco device. The goal was to be able to push any config to any selected device. You can upload the configs to the Lab Station and push them directly to the startup config of any selected Cisco device in a lab setting.

Easily Retrieve and Edit saved Labs

The configs of all your labs are easy to find or edit  and are ready to be deployed whenever you need.

 

Rollback Capability

The rollback functions allow you to simply rollback your Cisco devices to previously saved configs whenever you choose. You can rollback your configs to either the running or startup config of a GNS3 virtual device or on a Real Cisco device.

Rapid Revision Capability

Complete storage and easy review and re-use of all the commands and scripts that you run on Cisco devices for all the labs you do.

Outputs of User mode show commands are automatically saved and you can enter and keep commonly used show commands for quick and easy retrieval.

Macros - Save and run any config change scripts as macros for easy access and use. You can store thousands of configuration change scripts for use on Cisco devices.

USB Export/Import Capability 

Export/Import saved Lab configs, macro scripts and show commands used in doing Cisco labs. Keep them for re-use or share them with others to compare your labs.

The Software System

Leanides Pty Ltd was founded in Australia in 2017 and the Leanides V2R Lab Station is the product of 4 years of independent R&D. Leanides is a VMware Standard Technology Alliance Partner and we use VMware Workstation Pro for hosting the V2R Lab Station as we believe it's the best platform around and it's fully compatible with our product. If you are already using GNS3 with VMware Workstation Pro then the Leanides V2R Lab Station is the right choice for you as it will enhance your Cisco lab experience and empower you to do so much more.

The Leanides V2R Lab Station has evolved as a software system, through constant application and testing in a lab environment. With insight and  imagination, I built the software system from the ground up, based on industry experience and applied that knowledge into the design every step of the way. It's the reason why you won't see anything like it anywhere else, it's also why the system is so intuitive and easy to use and it's what kept driving the project to evolve constantly. 

Live working demonstrations of the software system have been conducted at several innovation hubs in and around Brisbane (Australia). The feedback obtained from the demonstrations helped to further improve the ergonomics of the software GUI to produce a system that is easy to configure and use. I am continually doing further development on the software and these updates will be available to subscribers during the license period. The Leanides V2R Lab Station will be available for download at the completion of the campaign and I can assure you with confidence that your order will be fullfilled and a license will be sent to your email address.

Technical Requirements

The software can be installed on any Windows laptop or PC that is typically used to run GNS3 Virtual Labs with VMware Workstation Pro.

Client PC Operating System

The Leanides V2R Lab Station Client software application is compatible with Windows 7, 8 and 10.

VMware Workstation Pro

The Leanides V2R Lab Station installs as a Virtual Machine on VMware Workstation Pro.

• 2 dedicated CPU cores

• 4 GB memory

• 32 GB disk (fixed size)

GNS3 

The  Leanides V2R Lab Station is compatible with Virtual labs done on GNS3.

Giving You the Edge is Why we're here on Indiegogo

Indiegogo is a great place to reach people that are looking for something that is ahead of the curve.  As the developer of the Leanides V2R Lab Station and Founder of the company, the most important thing for me is to see people get use out of the product and fully enjoy the benefits that it provides. My hope is to give an edge to supporters of the product by helping them to go further and get more out of their network labs.

I am looking to build a long term association with the backers of the campaign and product through supporting their use of the Leanides V2R Lab Station and through further developing the software to suit their needs.

Using the V2R Lab Station can save a great deal of time by not having to re-type configs every time a lab is done and that means more free time for you. It also enables you to do much more with easy review of the outputs of past labs for fast revision and you can also redeploy labs quickly when you need to. Being able to redeploy your saved labs quickly and easily can be of great benefit in the week before exams. I trust that the benefits will last throughout your course of study and be of value to you in your future career.

Timeline

    Please share our campaign with your friends

    If you would like to help us with our campaign we would be very happy and grateful for your help. You can help us by using the share buttons on the following youtube video or at the top of our campaign and sharing our campaign with someone you know or just by telling your friends about us. We're also on Facebook.

    Thank You

story:
Who is Amin?

As a Palestinian from Gaza, things have never been easy from securing food to water to pursuing education.  Hard work in hopes of achieving one’s dreams keeps us going. We live on hope. It is in our blood. Years ago, I challenged my circumstances.  I aimed to pursue my dream of becoming a doctor. I earned the highest scores in high school and successfully joinedKyrgyz-Russian Slavic University. I am currently a 4th-year medical student there but the financial support of my family, is no longer available. Now, the completion of my studies depends on your support and I have hope that you, people out there, will be able to help me.

I am a refugee who lived in one of the poorest camps in Gaza Strip called the Bureij camp. My father is a builder who works for 12+ hours to earn 10$ a day. We are a family of 14 and his salary barely covers the basic needs of our life.

 

Despite these difficulties, my parents always encouraged me to study hard to secure a better future. They see me as their hope, the future doctor who is going to help everyone in need. They always said “Your education is what will provide you with a good life, and help you earn good money. Education is your way to serve both your family and your community”. My family worked so hard to create a nurturing environment that enabled me to excel in my high school and the past years of college.

 

 

Why medicine? And How will I give back to Gaza?

 

The reason I chose medicine is that I want to help as many people possible in Gaza. Being a doctor is a sacred mission that I have dedicated myself to. I have taken it upon myself to make the difference I want to see in Gaza. I want to open the path for people after me to fulfill their dreams and complete their education successfully to give back to their community. I want to help put an ending to the suffering of many innocent people in Gaza by filling the shortage of the medical workforce to save more lives.

 

 

Why am I raising funds?

 

My home city has always been subjected to wars and conflicts. I lived through very hard times with my family. While I am in Kyrgyzstan for college, my family is still living my family is still living in Gaza's very rough conditions. They are unable to support my studies anymore.

 

My father used to work day and night to support my family in addition to covering my living expenses, transportation, and tuition. Moreover, my sister used to send me almost all her salary to help me continue my studies. However, she lost her job due to the current situation in the Gaza Strip. The prior pushed my father to borrow money, but now they don’t have any source of income.

 

I am now in a position where I can either go home with almost no chance of a better future or continue my dream with your generous help. And that is why my future and the future of all the people I can help with my degree is in your the hands now. The only way I will be able to continue my studies is through your donation.   

 

Education is the best kind of investment because you are investing in people. People will then invest in other people. This cycle elevates communities and helps them flourish which ensures better living conditions for its people. And that is what I want for Palestine and its people.

 

Your donation will not only be a financial relief but a psychological one as well. It’ll enable me to focus on my studies and improve my scores. That will help me excel and serve my country. I will be eternally grateful to each contribution you make!

 

What the money will be used for?

Tuition for the last two years, for visa registration and living fees.

story:
Click Here for English!

Breve reseña

La Red Financiera Solidaridad es una plataforma tecnológica que usando redes sociales permitirá que los 350 millones de pobres de Latinoamérica salgan de la pobreza con su esfuerzo emprendedor.  Para lograrlo la Red Financiera proveerá: un mercado de nano-valores para financiar los micro-emprendimientos, asesoría en los modelos de negocio, tecnología operativa y de control, negociaciones por volumen tanto para la compra como para la venta.  

El poder materializar los sueños permite enfrentar a la pobreza y vencerla.  Un día de 1970, mientras vivía en el sector rural, jugaba con mis hermanas a describir que íbamos a ser cuando crezcamos. Cuando llegó mi turno dije:  voy a estudiar mucho para ganarme una beca, estudiar un postgrado, hacerme científico, luego empresario, llevar a pasear a mi mamá por el mundo, ayudar a mis hermanos y hacer empresas que ayuden a la gente a salir de la pobreza.  Hoy, un día del 2015, tengo un doctorado en Física de Estado Sólido, he dado la vuelta al mundo como científico, empresario y motivador de cambio familiar, he llevado a pasear a mi madre alrededor del mundo, he ayudado a mis hermanos y sobrinos a obtener un título universitario y he permitido que miles de familias tengan un trabajo digno en cinco países diferentes de Latinoamérica.  Para completar mis sueños, desde hace dos años estoy trabajando en la construcción de la primera Red Financiera Solidaria del mundo que permitirá que los 350 millones de pobres de Latinoamérica creen sus propias empresas y venzan a la pobreza sin recibir limosna y usando las reglas del mercado.

Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes

  • Necesitamos acelerar la construcción de la primera Red Financiera Solidaria para lo cual se requiere un capital adicional de 500 mil dólares.  Este dinero se invertirá en cuatro rubros principales: 1.- 150 mil dólares para completar la construcción del sistema informático que opera la Red Financiera Solidaria Los Mosqueteros a nivel Latinoamericano, 2.- 250 mil dólares para compra una licencia financiera que permita operar en el mercado de valores  3.- 50 mil dólares para contratar con universidades locales la identificación de oportunidades de negocio que cumplan dos características principales: se beneficien de grandes volúmenes y necesiten alta dispersión de puntos de venta, y 4.-  50 mil dólares para invertir en mercadeo y publicidad en redes sociales.
  • Los contribuyentes recibirán reconocimiento público en el muro de patrocinadores del sitio www.losmosqueteros.com.  Este es un muro virtual donde inscribiremos los nombres y apellidos de cada una de las personas que contribuyan en este proyecto.  Adicionalmente, a las personas que contribuyan más de 50 dólares les enviaremos por correo una camiseta exclusiva de Los Mosqueteros.  Para las personas que aporten más de 100 dólares les enviaremos una gorra de diseño original con el logo de la Red Financiera Solidaria Los Mosqueteros con la inscripción “Juntos Venceremos”. Los contribuyentes que aporten más de mil dólares recibirán un juego de ajedrez fabricado de marfil vegetal (tagua) con los logos y frases de Los Mosqueteros.
  • Algo que he aprendido en el desarrollo de negocios alrededor del mundo es: si la propuesta es buena, hay que seguir insistiendo hasta que el mercado objetivo la adopte.  Los recursos que recibamos serán utilizados para desarrollar cada uno de los frentes en forma proporcional.  De cada dólar recibido 30 centavos serán utilizados para continuar construyendo el software, 50 centavos se destinarán a la compra de la licencia financiera, 10 centavos se destinarán a investigación y 10 centavos a mercadeo y publicidad.  Este es un proyecto que debe perdurar, por lo tanto, lo construiremos una piedra sobre otra para que sea sólido.

El impacto

  • Latinoamérica tiene una población de 550 millones de habitantes de los cuales el 70% son pobres- 350 millones de pobres.  Los organismos políticos locales y mundiales gastan miles de millones de dólares cada año en campañas que mal educan a los Latinoamericanos.  Estas campañas consideran a los pobres inútiles e incapaces para salir por sus propios medios de la pobreza y los acostumbran a recibir limosnas.  La experiencia de miles de Latinoamericanos que hemos salido de la pobreza es que para salir de ella hay que hacer emprendimientos que reúnan tres condiciones: 1. Que sean oportunidades que respondan a necesidades de la mayoría- comida, medicina, mecánica, agricultura 2. Que los negocios sean escalables para obtener beneficios de volumen y agrupación 3. Que sean fáciles de entender para que los 210 millones de usuarios de las redes sociales puedan ser accionistas de esos negocios aportando pequeñas cantidades de dinero- nanoinversiones.
  • Cada dólar que Usted aporte será utilizado para crear la infraestructura tecnológica y de conocimiento que permita guiar a los 350 millones de pobres de Latinoamericanos en la creación de sus propias empresas.  Las personas que, con esfuerzo y trabajo honrado, hemos logrado alejar la pobreza de nuestras vidas, tenemos que unir esfuerzos para ayudar a los demás a salir de la lista de pobres. Unos pocos dólares servirán para que le enseñemos al mundo que “Juntos Venceremos” a la pobreza.
  • La Red Financiera Solidaria Los Mosqueteros se ha estado construyendo desde hace dos años.  Se hizo el lanzamiento del sitio web el 20 de marzo de 2015 con un primer producto- subastas de media móvil.  El objetivo de este producto es educar a los miembros en el concepto de solidaridad y ahorro. Muchos estudiantes universitarios han logrado comprar laptops pagando un 30% del valor de mercado, la diferencia fue pagada por los otros participantes. En la actualidad, el sitio  tiene 5 mil usuarios y el número de registrados crece a una tasa del 5% semanal.  En el mes de Octubre  saldremos con dos productos solidarios más: contribuciones y regalos.  Las contribuciones son pequeños préstamos que los contactos en las redes sociales hacen a cada miembro.  Estos préstamos no cobran interéses y se deben devolver cuando el que dió la ayuda lo solicite. También funcionará un mecanismo de ayuda para emergencias: entierro inesperado, enfermedad grave, matrícula escolar, matrimonio.  Estas serán ayudas no reembolsables pero el receptor deberá colaborar en otras solicitudes similares. Estos productos sirven para enseñar a los miembros las ventajas de la solidaridad.  La segunda fase del proyecto es el lanzamiento del modelo de financiamiento de negocios con apoyo financiero de los miembros de la red como nano-inversionistas.  Esta segunda etapa esperamos terminarla a mediados del 2016 y confiamos que su nombre esté inscrito en el muro de los Mosqueteros que vencimos a la pobreza.

Riesgos y desafíos.

La solidaridad es un valor social muy arraigado en los Latinoamericanos pero se lo usa en forma local.  Nos proponemos enseñar a los 350 millones de pobres de la región que ese sentido de la solidaridad unido a las redes sociales y a la creatividad para los negocios nos puede dar la oportunidad de salir de pobreza ayudándonos unos a otros.  

El peligro principal en este modelo es que los beneficiarios no lo entiendan y no lo usen.  Otro peligro es que se acabe el dinero y no lleguemos al número de usuarios que permita mantener la red operando.  Obviamente hay peligros operativos y tecnológicos que el equipo administrador los mantiene controlados.

El riesgo de no despertar interés en los potenciales usuarios se reduce escogiendo bien el mercado objetivo para sembrar el concepto.  Hemos definido que la Red Financiera Solidaria se enfoque en los hombres y mujeres entre 18 y 35 años que usan redes sociales para entrar en el mercado.  Esto nos da un potencial de 150 millones de usuarios en la región.  Este mercado objetivo es el que más dificultad tiene para conseguir un empleo y está interesado en hacer su propio negocio pero no tiene suficiente dinero y conocimientos. 

Todo emprendimiento está limitado por el tiempo que tome llegar a un tamaño adecuado y la cantidad de dinero que tenga para lograrlo.  Terminar el software de la red y conseguir la licencia financiera son dos tareas que permitirán acelerar el crecimiento de la red.  Con su apoyo esperamos completar estas tareas en un año.  Creemos que la Red Financiera Solidaria cambiará la distribución de la riqueza en Latinoamérica y vamos a construirla con su ayuda

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

  • Toda ayuda que Usted pueda hacer para apoyar la construcción de la primera Red Financiera Solidaria será bien recibida.  Si Usted desea apoyar esta iniciativa con aportes en especie, lo aceptaremos con mucho gusto.  Necesitamos expertos en todos los campos de la administración, la ciencia, y la técnica para que ayuden con las evaluaciones de proyectos.  Si dispone de espacios publicitarios en redes sociales, también nos ayudaría a posicionar la red.  En definitiva, nuestra red puede hacer buen uso de todos los recursos que se nos ofrezcan.
  • La forma más simple de ayudar es difundir nuestra campaña entre sus contactos en las redes sociales.  Será mucho más fácil si es que lo hace utilizando las herramientas para compartir que ofrece Indiegogo.
  • Recuerde, Juntos Venceremos a la pobreza enseñándole a las personas a ser solidarios y a competir con las reglas del mercado.

English

Brief review

The Solidarity Financial Network is a technology platform that using social networks and the great penetration of information technology will permit the 350 million poor in Latin America getting out of poverty using their entrepreneurial efforts.  To achieve this goal, the network will provide: an electronic nano-securities market to finance the startups, advice on business models, operational and business control technology and volume negotiations for both purchase and sales.

The power to make dreams come true help to overcome poverty. One day in 1970, while living in the countryside, playing with my sisters to describe what we were going to be when we grow up, I said:  I will study hard to earn a scholarship to study graduate school abroad to become a scientist, that will help me to become an entrepreneur, to take my mom around the world, to help my brothers and sisters to get a career, and to build companies to help people get out of poverty. Today, one day in 2015, I have a PhD in Solid State Physics, I've been around the world as a scientist, entrepreneur, and as a motivator for family success, I have taken my mother around the world, I have helped my brothers and nephews to get university carrers and have helped thousands of families to have well paid jobs in five different Latin American countries. To complete my dreams, for the last two years I have been working on the construction of the first Solidarity Financial Network in the world that will allow the 350 million poor people in Latin America to create their own businesses and overcome poverty without receiving compassion money and competing with the market rules .

What we need and what you get

• We need to accelerate the construction of the first Solidarity Financial Network for which an additional sum of $ 500,000 is required. This money will be invested in four main areas: 1. $ 150,000 to complete construction of the sotware that operates the Solidarity Financial Network “The Musketeers”, 2. $ 250,000 to purchase a financial license to operate the nano-securities,  3. $ 50,000 to contract local universities to identify business opportunities in each country that benefit from high volumes and high dispersion of outlets, and 4. $ 50,000 to invest in marketing and advertising in social networks.

• Contributors will receive public recognition at the cyber memorial wall  in the www.losmosqueteros.com site. This is a virtual wall where contributors names will be engraved.  Additionally, people who contribute more than $ 50 we receive an exclusive T-shirt of the The Musketeers.  For people who contribute more than $ 100 will send a cap with the logo of the Solidarity Financial Network the Musketeers with the inscription "Together We Shall Overcome."  Contributors of more than one thousand dollars will get a Tagua ( Vegetable Ivory) Chess Game decorated with The Musketeers logos and phrases.

• One thing I've learned in business development around the world is: if the proposal is good, you must continue to insist until the target market adopts it. The funds received will be used to develop each of the activities in proportion. Of every dollar received 30 cents will be used to continue building the software, 50 cents will go towards the purchase of financial license, 10 cents will go to research and 10 cents to marketing and advertising. This is a project that should last, therefore it will build a stone upon another to make it solid.

The Impact

• Latin America has a population of 550 million people of whom 70% are poor- 350 million poor. Local and global political organizations spend billions of dollars each year in campaigns that mal-educate the Latin American poor. These campaigns consider the poor unwilling, weak and incapable of overcoming poverty. The experience of thousands of Latin Americans who have moved out of poverty will be used to help others.  Their experience will be used to help people finding business opportunities in areas that have three concurrent characteristics: 1. Businesses related to food, medicine, engineering,  and agriculture 2. The different opportunities can be grouped to reach big volumes.  3. The business models are easy to explain to the 210 million users of social networks who can become shareholders of those businesses providing small amounts of money-  we call a dollar investment a nano- investments.

• Every dollar you contribute will be used to create the technological infrastructure and knowledge to lead the 350 million poor in Latin America in creating their own businesses. People who, with effort and honest work, have succeeded in getting out of poverty, must join efforts to help others out of the list of poor. A few dollars that will be used to teach the world that "Together We Shall Overcome" poverty.

• The Solidarity Financial Network “The Musketeers” has been building for two years. The website  www.losmosqueteros.com was launched on March 20, 2015 with a first product: mobile media auctions. The purpose of this product is to educate members on the concept of solidarity and savings. Using this product several University students have been able to buy their laptops paying 30% of the market value.  The difference was paid by the other members.  The site currently has 5000 users and the number of registered is growing at a rate of 5% per week. In October, two more products will be incorporated: contributions and gifts. Contributions are small loans that the contacts on the social networks make to each other member. These loans do not charge interest and must be returned when the person who gave the help requests.  The Gift product is a mechanism to help members on emergency situations: unexpected funeral, serious illness, school enrollment, marriage. These are not reimbursable grants but the recipients must contribute to others if  they wish for applying again for a gift in the future. These products serve to teach members the benefits of solidarity. The second phase of the project is the roll out of the startup financing with nano-investments. We will finish this stage by mid-2016 and we are confident that your name will be engraved on the cyber wall of the Musketeers so that together we will beat poverty.

Risks and Challenges

Solidarity is a deeply rooted social value in Latin American but it is only used locally. We intend to teach the 350 million poor in the region that the solidarity linked to social networks and creativity for business will give us the opportunity to get out of poverty by helping one another. The main danger in this model is that beneficiaries do not understand and do not use the platform. Another danger is that the of we ran out money and do not get to the number of users that maintains the network operating. Obviously there are operational and technological hazards that are controlled by the company team.

The risk of not arousing interest in potential users is reduced if the target market is well chosen to plant the concept. The Solidarity Financial Network target market focuses on men and women aged 18 to 35 who use social networks. This gives us a potential of 150 million users in the region. Additionally, this target market is the group of people with the largest unemployment rate.  They are eager to star their own business as a way of generating some income, but they do not have enough money and expertise.

Every enterprise is limited by the time it takes to reach an adequate size and the amount of money that it has to do it. Completion of the network software and buying of a financial license are the two tasks that will accelerate the growth of the network. With your support we expect to complete these tasks within a year. We believe that the Solidarity Financial Network will change the distribution of wealth in Latin America, and we will build it.

Other Ways You Can Help

• Any help that you can do to support the construction of the first Solidarity Financial Network will be well received. If you wish to support this initiative with contributions different from money, we will accept it with pleasure. We need expertise in all fields of administration, science, and technology to help with project evaluations. If you have advertising money left on social networks, we can used it to position the network. In short, our network can make good use of all the resources that you may offer us.

• The simplest way to help our campaign is to share our proposal to your contacts on social networks. It will be much easier if you do it using the sharing tools provided by Indiegogo.

• Remember, together we will defeat poverty by teaching people to be supportive and to compete fairly.
story_txt:
Click Here for English!
Breve reseña
La Red Financiera Solidaridad es una plataforma tecnológica que usando
redes sociales permitirá que los 350 millones de pobres de Latinoamérica salgan
de la pobreza con su esfuerzo emprendedor.  Para lograrlo la Red Financiera proveerá: un
mercado de nano-valores para financiar los micro-emprendimientos, asesoría en
los modelos de negocio, tecnología operativa y de control, negociaciones por
volumen tanto para la compra como para la venta.  
El poder materializar los sueños permite enfrentar a la pobreza y
vencerla.  Un día de 1970, mientras vivía
en el sector rural, jugaba con mis hermanas a describir que íbamos a ser cuando crezcamos.
Cuando llegó mi turno dije:  voy a
estudiar mucho para ganarme una beca, estudiar un postgrado, hacerme
científico, luego empresario, llevar a pasear a mi mamá por el mundo, ayudar a
mis hermanos y hacer empresas que ayuden a la gente a salir de la pobreza.  Hoy, un día del 2015, tengo un doctorado en
Física de Estado Sólido, he dado la vuelta al mundo como científico, empresario y motivador de cambio familiar, he llevado a pasear a mi madre alrededor del mundo, he ayudado a
mis hermanos y sobrinos a obtener un título universitario y he permitido que miles
de familias tengan un trabajo digno en cinco países diferentes de
Latinoamérica.  Para completar mis
sueños, desde hace dos años estoy trabajando en la construcción de la primera
Red Financiera Solidaria del mundo que permitirá que los 350 millones de pobres
de Latinoamérica creen sus propias empresas y venzan a la pobreza sin recibir
limosna y usando las reglas del mercado. 
Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes

Necesitamos acelerar la construcción de
     la primera Red Financiera Solidaria para lo cual se requiere un capital adicional
     de 500 mil dólares.  Este dinero se
     invertirá en cuatro rubros principales: 1.- 150 mil dólares para completar
     la construcción del sistema informático que opera la Red Financiera
     Solidaria Los Mosqueteros a nivel Latinoamericano, 2.- 250 mil dólares
     para compra una licencia financiera que permita operar en el mercado de
     valores  3.- 50 mil dólares para
     contratar con universidades locales la identificación de oportunidades de negocio que cumplan dos características principales: se beneficien de grandes volúmenes y necesiten alta dispersión de
     puntos de venta, y 4.-  50 mil
     dólares para invertir en mercadeo y publicidad en redes sociales.
Los contribuyentes recibirán
     reconocimiento público en el muro de patrocinadores del sitio
     www.losmosqueteros.com.  Este es un
     muro virtual donde inscribiremos los nombres y apellidos de cada una de
     las personas que contribuyan en este proyecto.  Adicionalmente, a las personas que
     contribuyan más de 50 dólares les enviaremos por correo una camiseta
     exclusiva de Los Mosqueteros.  Para
     las personas que aporten más de 100 dólares les enviaremos una gorra de diseño original con
     el logo de la Red Financiera Solidaria Los Mosqueteros con la inscripción “Juntos
     Venceremos”. Los contribuyentes que aporten más de mil dólares recibirán un juego de ajedrez fabricado de marfil vegetal (tagua) con los logos y frases de Los Mosqueteros.
Algo que he aprendido en el
     desarrollo de negocios alrededor del mundo es: si la propuesta es buena,
     hay que seguir insistiendo hasta que el mercado objetivo la adopte.  Los recursos que recibamos serán
     utilizados para desarrollar cada uno de los frentes en forma
     proporcional.  De cada dólar
     recibido 30 centavos serán utilizados para continuar construyendo el
     software, 50 centavos se destinarán a la compra de la licencia financiera,
     10 centavos se destinarán a investigación y 10 centavos a mercadeo y
     publicidad.  Este es un proyecto que
     debe perdurar, por lo tanto, lo construiremos una piedra sobre otra para
     que sea sólido.

El impacto

Latinoamérica tiene una
     población de 550 millones de habitantes de los cuales el 70% son pobres-
     350 millones de pobres.  Los
     organismos políticos locales y mundiales gastan miles de millones de
     dólares cada año en campañas que mal educan a los Latinoamericanos.  Estas campañas consideran a los pobres
     inútiles e incapaces para salir por sus propios medios de la pobreza y los
     acostumbran a recibir limosnas.  La
     experiencia de miles de Latinoamericanos que hemos salido de la pobreza es
     que para salir de ella hay que hacer emprendimientos que reúnan tres
     condiciones: 1. Que sean oportunidades que respondan a necesidades de la
     mayoría- comida, medicina, mecánica, agricultura 2. Que los negocios sean
     escalables para obtener beneficios de volumen y agrupación 3. Que sean
     fáciles de entender para que los 210 millones de usuarios de las redes
     sociales puedan ser accionistas de esos negocios aportando pequeñas
     cantidades de dinero- nanoinversiones. 
Cada dólar que Usted aporte
     será utilizado para crear la infraestructura tecnológica y de conocimiento
     que permita guiar a los 350 millones de pobres de Latinoamericanos en la
     creación de sus propias empresas. 
     Las personas que, con esfuerzo y trabajo honrado, hemos logrado
     alejar la pobreza de nuestras vidas, tenemos que unir esfuerzos para
     ayudar a los demás a salir de la lista de pobres. Unos pocos dólares
     servirán para que le enseñemos al mundo que “Juntos Venceremos” a la
     pobreza. 
La Red Financiera Solidaria
     Los Mosqueteros se ha estado construyendo desde hace dos años.  Se hizo el lanzamiento del sitio web el
     20 de marzo de 2015 con un primer producto- subastas de media móvil.  El objetivo de este producto es educar a
     los miembros en el concepto de solidaridad y ahorro. Muchos estudiantes universitarios han logrado comprar laptops pagando un 30% del valor de mercado, la diferencia fue pagada por los otros participantes. En la actualidad, el sitio  tiene 5 mil usuarios y el número de registrados crece a una tasa del 5%
     semanal.  En el mes de Octubre  saldremos con dos productos solidarios más: contribuciones y regalos.  Las contribuciones son pequeños
     préstamos que los contactos en las redes sociales hacen a cada
     miembro.  Estos préstamos no cobran
     interéses y se deben devolver cuando el que dió la ayuda lo solicite.
     También funcionará un mecanismo de ayuda para emergencias: entierro
     inesperado, enfermedad grave, matrícula escolar, matrimonio.  Estas serán ayudas no reembolsables pero
     el receptor deberá colaborar en otras solicitudes similares. Estos
     productos sirven para enseñar a los miembros las ventajas de la solidaridad.  La segunda fase del proyecto es el
     lanzamiento del modelo de financiamiento de negocios con apoyo financiero
     de los miembros de la red como nano-inversionistas.  Esta segunda etapa esperamos terminarla
     a mediados del 2016 y confiamos que su nombre esté inscrito en el muro de
     los Mosqueteros que vencimos a la pobreza.

Riesgos y desafíos.
La solidaridad es un valor social muy arraigado en los Latinoamericanos
pero se lo usa en forma local.  Nos
proponemos enseñar a los 350 millones de pobres de la región que ese sentido de
la solidaridad unido a las redes sociales y a la creatividad para los negocios
nos puede dar la oportunidad de salir de pobreza ayudándonos unos a otros.  El peligro principal en este modelo es que
los beneficiarios no lo entiendan y no lo usen. 
Otro peligro es que se acabe el dinero y no lleguemos al número de
usuarios que permita mantener la red operando. 
Obviamente hay peligros operativos y tecnológicos que el equipo administrador los mantiene controlados.
El riesgo de no despertar interés en los potenciales usuarios se reduce
escogiendo bien el mercado objetivo para sembrar el concepto.  Hemos definido que la Red Financiera
Solidaria se enfoque en los hombres y mujeres entre 18 y 35 años que usan redes
sociales para entrar en el mercado.  Esto
nos da un potencial de 150 millones de usuarios en la región.  Este mercado objetivo es el
que más dificultad tiene para conseguir un empleo y está interesado en hacer su
propio negocio pero no tiene suficiente dinero y conocimientos. 
Todo emprendimiento está limitado por el tiempo que tome llegar a un
tamaño adecuado y la cantidad de dinero que tenga para lograrlo.  Terminar el software de la red y conseguir la
licencia financiera son dos tareas que permitirán acelerar el crecimiento de la
red.  Con su apoyo esperamos completar
estas tareas en un año.  Creemos que la Red Financiera Solidaria cambiará la distribución de la
riqueza en Latinoamérica y vamos a construirla con su ayuda
Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

Toda ayuda que Usted pueda
     hacer para apoyar la construcción de la primera Red Financiera Solidaria
     será bien recibida.  Si Usted desea
     apoyar esta iniciativa con aportes en especie, lo aceptaremos con mucho
     gusto.  Necesitamos expertos en
     todos los campos de la administración, la ciencia, y la técnica para que
     ayuden con las evaluaciones de proyectos. 
     Si dispone de espacios publicitarios en redes sociales, también nos
     ayudaría a posicionar la red.  En
     definitiva, nuestra red puede hacer buen uso de todos los recursos que se
     nos ofrezcan. 
La forma más simple de
     ayudar es difundir nuestra campaña entre sus contactos en las redes
     sociales.  Será mucho más fácil si
     es que lo hace utilizando las herramientas para compartir que ofrece
     Indiegogo.
Recuerde, Juntos Venceremos
     a la pobreza enseñándole a las personas a ser solidarios y a competir con
     las reglas del mercado.

expertise in all fields of administration, science, and technology to help with
project evaluations. If you have advertising money left on social networks, we
can used it to position the network. In short, our network can make good use of
all the resources that you may offer us.
• The
simplest way to help our campaign is to share our proposal to your contacts on
social networks. It will be much easier if you do it using the sharing tools provided
by Indiegogo.
• Remember,
together we will defeat poverty by teaching people to be supportive and to
compete fairly.

story:
Introduction

Hi! My name is Andrea.  I am excited to introduce two books that I pray will inspire faith, language learning, and wonder about God's Creation. 

My mission:

1. Publish bilingual Christian books that glorify God and celebrate diversity.
2. Send bilingual books with mission teams to Latin America to help people connect with the      children there and provide a gift of bilingual literature to the children and their families that shares the love of Jesus.
3. Provide Christian homeschooling families a resource that teaches science from a Christian perspective and an opportunity to learn Spanish.
4. Assist individuals and churches to form connections among English and Spanish-speaking populations in the U.S. by providing them with resources that are bilingual that help each population to make a connection through language.

Sing with Creation/Canta con la Creación

It has been my dream to create this for children to learn worship songs in Spanish/English as well Spanish/English phrases throughout the book by clicking on buttons to listen and learn. It is a personal journey of what God encouraged me with in verse and song and combines my joys and passions of worship, Spanish, writing, illustrating and teaching children about Jesus. I thank my family and friends who donated their time and talents to helping with this project. The book is for ages 2-8, and it can encourage any age with the worship and verses. Anyone wanting to learn a few Spanish or English words can also learn along with the children! :)

Preview of next book:

Good Morning, Luna

My second book, Good Morning, Luna, is designed for Christian homeschooling families to read to teach science from a Christ-centered perspective.

-The book is a dialogue and is best read with a child reading one part and an adult or another child reading another part. The text is written in both English and Spanish at about a 2nd/3rd reading level. 

-There are two versions of the book: one is for ages 6-8 and one is for ages 2-5

I have included a few illustrations from the book in this campaign as a preview. 

Opportunities to support this mission:

Pray- God put these books on my heart to write, and my prayer is that He would receive the glory. I thank you for your prayers over the hearts of those who read these books would come to know Jesus in a deeper way. 
             
Support Financially-The money will go towards having the book Sing with Creation/Canta con la Creación published in print.

The interactive audio version of Sing with Creation, Canta con la Creación, is a gift to anyone who donates. 

Thank you

Thank you in advance for your support and prayers. Please share this campaign with others you think would be interested. My target audience is families with children ages 2-8 who would like to incorporate books that help them to learn more about the world around them from a Christian perspective.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Kodi Robot was presented at Masters&Robots 2018 Conference

BENEFITS FROM KODI

With your your suggestions and feedback, we’ve made KODI perfectly tailored to your and your child’s needs. Take a look at KODI’s main features:

KODI CAN

KODI can do all those extraordinary things because it is equipped with hi-tech solutions.

KODI FOR KIDS

Kodi was created to provide sustainable cognitive development for children. It supports kids in many ways, activating both the left and the right cerebral hemisphere.

Kodi creates an environment for curiosity that is followed by a huge creativity boost in your child! It employs many imaginative thinking activities, such as: storytelling, ideation and associations games, creating mind maps, and many others. Remember – according to various studies, creativity is the most crucial factor for future success!

Children learn most effectively through interactive conversations, and Kodi really is a smooth talker! It uses contingent responding, which means it actively listens, contributes relevant responses, and asks related questions. The vivid interactions supported by hi-tech solution lead to your kid’s vocabulary expanding and result in language acquisition.

Kodi was programmed with the assistance of an academic child psychologist who contributed their care for cognitive stages of child’s development. That’s why it adapts to your child’s age and provides appropriate activities for the preoperational reasoning stage, and other for the concrete operational stage. It means that younger kids get eg. memory games, alphabet, spelling and counting exercises, while the older ones get riddles, fun facts, and world, universe or historical maps etc.

Music is highly important in any child’s development and Kodi knows how to encourage children to play instruments, compose, rhyme, sing, and dance! Musical training develops areas of the brain that are related to language and reasoning, improves hand-eye coordination and motor skills, builds imagination, intellectual curiosity, and even spatial intelligence. But above all, musical skills are useful, fun, and who knows – maybe you’ll raise a future star?

The importance of learning foreign languages cannot be overestimated in today’s world. It’s not only about being a citizen of the world. Studying is a benefit in itself, resulting in better native language apprehension, an ear for music, and out of the box thinking. That’s why Kodi provides individual foreign language learning techniques adjusted to your kid’s age. Rest assured, all in all it’s way cheaper than any language school.

EI is the ability to be smart about feelings – both our own and those of other people. Kodi was developed with special care for expressing emotions so that it can teach to be mindful of the feelings of others, but also self-aware and self-confident. It will engage your child to responsibility, commitment and emotion recognition activities. It's absolutely crucial, in a world lacking of empathy, full of anonymous judges in social media, and where bullying behaviors are so common, to be emotionally responsible.

Each child is different and has a unique spark of genius that Kodi won’t miss! It adjusts to every individual to empower their natural talents. Kodi analyzes the strongest and weakest assets by engaging the child in diverse activities and keeping statistics. It provides personalized education that will ensure your child’s sustainable development.

 

KODI FOR PARENTS

We are mothers and fathers ourselves, so we know from experience how challenging it is to raise a child. We also consulted a lot of other parents during the developing process. This is why Kodi is so perfectly tailored for the parents' needs and problems.

Kodi will be your aid in some of the parenting responsibilities by making sure your kid follows their daily schedule and overseeing the repetitive activities. It can wake your child up on time and mind their morning or evening routine, such as dressing up, brushing their teeth, doing homework etc., and meanwhile, you can take care of your other duties. Kodi administers healthy daily habits of waking-up and bedtime, but also teaches responsibility and self-reliance.

You could call Kodi a parent’s peace of mind companion. It creates healthy environment for your child by controlling play duration and delivered content, and limiting passive entertainment. Kodi looks after your child 24/7 and if anything worrisome happens, it will alarm you immediately through an app. And remember – Kodi never sleeps, which makes it a reliable night watchman. So you can sleep peacefully, knowing that Kodi will call you if you're needed.

Kodi goes with a dedicated, clean and multifunctional application for iOS and Android that is paired with your robot. Via the app, you can take a look at your child through Kodi’s eyes and make sure everything is fine, or call them and talk anytime you want. The app provides you also with: a remote control over playtime and schedule following, access to statistics of activities and your child’s progress, as well as all the photos and videos made by Kodi, so that you won't miss any important achievements or funny situations!

 

 

DETAILS

 

 

TEAM

Kodi has many parents but meet those the most dedicated.

 

How an idea turned into the Kodi your kids will play with...

We have already prepared and planned all the way to the mass production.

All we need is your support to make Kodi - AI powered robot available on the market to revolutionize children’s playtime and home education through the first truly responsive interactions. 

 

Give your child a great creativity booster and learning inspirator!

Creativity is the mental characteristic that allows us to think outside of the box, which results in taking an innovative approach to solving problems. It is believed that creativity is a crucial factor for success in the modern world. However, scientific evidence shows that if we don't exercise our imagination, we lose the ability to be creative. According to the research, we are born creative geniuses, and later many factors of the modern world - passive entertainment, video games, mass education or standardized testing - dumb us down.

Protect imaginative treasure in your child!

You can expect to see some tremendous intellectual, social, and emotional changes while your child will just have fun and good time with Kodi. 

 

Get your KODI by selecting your perk from the sidebar at the top of this page.

 

KODI FAQ

 

Who is Kodi designed for?

Kodi was made with kids aged 4-8 and their parents in mind, but we are sure that any child and adult will be entertained by this intelligent toy.

 

When will Kodi ship?

We are planning to start shipping Kodi 6 months after the crowdfunding campaign is over.

 

Where does Kodi ship?

All over the world! Wherever you live, Kodi will get delivered.

 

Does Kodi move?

Kodi rotates its head and body, so that it can follow what is happening around it. However, it doesn’t have wheels or legs, so it can’t move from place to place on its own. Kodi isn't heavy, though – you or your child can easily pick it up and move any place you want.

 

What languages does Kodi speak?

For now, Kodi is an English speaker. We are constantly developing its functionalities and working on adding more common languages.

Also Kodi can teach Spanish.

 

How to turn Kodi on for the first time?

It’s super easy! When you take Kodi out of the box, all you need to do is connect it to electricity and push the “On” button.

 

Do I need a WiFi network for Kodi to work?

Yes, Kodi connects with the app via WiFi.

 

How do I charge Kodi?

Kodi has a battery that needs to be charged, just like a smartphone.

 

How easy is it to set up Kodi?

You can set up Kodi through the dedicated app that comes with the robot. It’s very intuitive and easy to use.

 

Can I access Kodi remotely from outside of my house?

Sure you can! Kodi is controlled via the mobile app, so you have access to its control panel anytime and anywhere.

 

Does the app work with iOS, Android and Windows mobile devices?

The Kodi app is going to work on iOS and Android only.

 

Can I control Kodi with several smartphones?

Yes, there are no limits for the number of smartphones that can control one Kodi.

 

Where can I download the app for Kodi?

You can download the Kodi app by scanning the special QR code that is included in Kodi’s welcome package, but it will also be available in both App Store and Google Play.

 

What does the app do?

The app allows you to control Kodi by establishing its daily routines, games schedule, and teaching cycles. It also gives you access to the statistics of activities, your child’s progress, and the videos or photos that Kodi made.

 

How long does the battery last?

It depends on the usage, but approximately 4 hours. We are still working on extending battery life.

 

Does Kodi have an On/Off function?

Yes, you can turn Kodi on/off whenever you need to.

 

Are any accessories necessary to use Kodi?

No. Accessories that we offer are bonuses that can adjust its look or add new functionalities. But you don’t need them to use the Kodi’s classic version.

 

Is the software open source?

No.

 

How secure is this?

We've been developing Kodi for a few months, knowing that the kids safety issues are essential. From the materials used and a rounded shape, to designing games and displaying content, we wanted to be absolutely sure that this toy would be safe for your child.

 

How does Kodi store information?

By using the concept of neural networks, Kodi learns new information and processes it to know more about its users. He is using the data to adjust its behaviour and functionalities to its users' expectations. It doesn't store any information about users.

 

How does Kodi respect my privacy?

Kodi doesn't send any audio or video materials to the cloud. All data is processed inside the robot itself, so it's perfectly safe.

 

How much does it cost?

We are still working on lowering production costs to establish optimum price. One thing is certain – it will never be cheaper than it is here!

 

Is the shipping cost included in the price of Kodi?

We are still working on it. We encourage you to follow our updates to learn more.

 

If I have a question, how can I reach your team?

Please contact us via email: hello@koditoy.com

story:
＊＊Strictly training a dog is not cruel to him, and in the same way, letting a dog do whatever he wants is not a true love of a dog. The dog needs firm and strong guidance, and if no one teaches him how to react in various situations, he will also be anxious. Although it is nominally to train dogs, the purpose of all training is actually to teach owners to better communicate and communicate with dogs. After all, our IQ and understanding are higher than them, so we need to understand and adapt. they. If you don't teach or communicate poorly, don't expect the dog to try to adapt to you, he will only think that you are not a good leader and therefore disrespect you.

 

Dog training is based on effective communication. Dogs can’t understand us, but effective communication must ensure that the owner’s wishes and requirements are communicated to Dogs. That is to say, Dogs must know whether one of their specific behaviors is right or wrong in order for training to be meaningful. If you beat him and scold him, but he doesn't know what he did wrong, it will only make him afraid of you and his behavior will not be corrected.

story:
Rise&Shine - Our Story 

  • Since childhood I've been an   individual   who liked to visualize something fun and then  go out and see if  the dream could actually become a reality.When I was about 10 I would play with worms or pretend I was riding on a horse as I sat on a large branch in hugh oak  tree in my backyard.
  • I truly believe growing up in a simple little suburban    neighborhood just 30 miles east of Los Angeles California made me the visual man I have become  today.  My Mother worked for the school district   and my  father was an accountant for an aerospace company. Me, Well I  was a kid that dreamed a lot  performed a lot  and played  sports as a kid with my family and friends.
  • My Parents  allowed me to flourish as I had sports and the arts in my life growing up. Coming from humble beginnings in southern states my parents preached to me that   Going to school, graduating and going to college was the goal. They were creative and showing me  what I  had to do  they thought me to believe in my self and be self determined. Once I realized a goal was a possibility   their were no other options at all.
  • I was blessed to follow my dreams and became an actor  booked  a few gigs in Hollywood,directed a few plays for kids that toured worked at some production companies and some dance companies , but ultimately  I knew education was the key for anybody who wanted to go any where in life. 
  •  I had struggles indeed  like when my parents passed away due to a sudden illness,but the one thing I knew for sure the arts helped me achieve my goals and I know its the answer for todays "RightNow" generation of kids  who cant keep their heads out of the video games and cell phones.
  •  I was able with an incredible friend Patrick Muro who I met many years ago working as servers at a restaurant   to create Rise&Shine, originally as just an idea based out of a numbers of live shows I produced for kids and schools.  To make a long story  shorter, which is tough now we were able to meet a publicist , gain access to celebrities  and create an inspirational show for kids and their families. It took me 7 years to create the original documentary which aired on KLCS/PBS in California. Later Patrick Joined in and we were able to turn a dream into reality with a series on KDOC-TV.
  • After  being on air for a few month we gained a small audience and touched many families and kids and  helped them see , believe and understand that the Arts are viable tool thats necessary for normality, love success and a healer in times  we experience despair. 
  • We were also graced with the ability to start and produce 8  episodes full of kids performing, see heart wrenching stories about struggle  from kids and their families  and finally  hear from some amazing celebrities  as they would go on to  tell their personal stories  about success and failure.  
  • Our current campaign is about raising funds to get the show back on air  and allow more than 5 million possible viewers in California to be part of our Rise &  Shine dream and family.
  • By Supporting our cause a Contributor will be the voice for the invisible voices of kids and families who have not been heard. A contributor to our cause will open doors that our current political stance  here in America is trying to shut.
  • Every voice counts, Every dime counts and every kid deserves a chance to perform and realize that their imagination can be just powerful enough to send them to college , open up an new innovative business in their  own communities and show what love for one another looks like.

What We Need & What You Get

Post Production Budget:  

Editing (4 Episodes)    - $ 6,000

Closed Caption (4 Episodes)-    -$1,000

Sound Mix (4 Episodes)-   $4,000

Airing Rate (4 Episodes)    $7,000

Promo-Trailer - $2,000

Total Budget Needs - $20,000

WHAT YOU GET:

 Any Contributor that stands   for education and the arts by standing up  for our cause will be able to gain access to a special  red -carpet event and screening in Hollywood only accessible to the   crew,executives ,celebrities  and be able to enjoy a small delicious  appitizer  and a free live performance by some talented kids and a surprise celebrity guest. Also all contributors will receive a private copy of all 4 episodes on a hard drive as well and get a special thanks in the show credits. 

Donors  that contribute  $100 or more will get the invite to the event 

Donors that contribute $500 or will be invited to walk the red carpet 

Donors that contribute $1000  or more will be invited to meet backstage guest  and sit with the executives during the presentation.

Donors that contribute $2000 or more will get all the VIP treatment as the rest plus a chance to be on a Rise&Shine episode 

All Donors will also walk away with a gift bag which  is  absolutely special  to the cause 

The Impact

  • Our Project has world wide value  education is the key to unlock many doors in life. Kids who take  interest in  the arts learn how to  take charge. The most exciting attributes to an arts education is that it effects the whole family in a life long powerful impact and communities who understand the arts ,understand the world better ,and hence we have a chance to be a community of  people who trust,respect and enjoy working together for the  good of the entire community and to the world.
  • Personally I will share that since this project is loaded with important examples of kids performing ,lots of celebrity testimonials, and ratings on the network reaching over all of Southern California, we are  confident that we have  viewers from our KDOC-TV Sunday afternoon time slot that would love to see the return of this very important broadcast. 
  • Parents enjoy  hearing from the older celebrities while kids enjoy watching other kids perform. 

Risks & Challenges

  • The challenge we face is of course other opposing network and cable shows that we compete with. The worst part os if no one thought this kind of program was an important tool for communities. Everyone sees education in one perspective,so the goal would be to help  consumers to understand that the arts transforms lives. Once we can accomplish this goal our program becomes an entertaining and enlightening piece of art work on the screen  and a great tool to discuss utilizing social media.
  • If we were to be faced with any negativity we would meet that with a joyous statistic on the power of the arts  in education and psychology. Students with special needs  benefit miraculously.

Other Ways You Can Help

 

  • If any one would like to help and support sharing the campaign  with other through social media  would be  a blessing.
story_txt:
Rise&Shine - Our Story 

Since childhood I've been an   individual   who liked to visualize something fun and then  go out and see if  the dream could actually become a reality.When I was about 10 I would play with worms or pretend I was riding on a horse as I sat on a large branch in hugh oak  tree in my backyard.

I truly believe growing up in a simple little suburban    neighborhood just 30 miles east of Los Angeles California made me the visual man I have become  today.  My Mother worked for the school district   and my  father was an accountant for an aerospace company. Me, Well I  was a kid that dreamed a lot  performed a lot  and played  sports as a kid with my family and friends.


My Parents  allowed me to flourish as I had sports and the arts in my life growing up. Coming from humble beginnings in southern states my parents preached to me that   Going to school, graduating and going to college was the goal. They were creative and showing me  what I  had to do  they thought me to believe in my self and be self determined. Once I realized a goal was a possibility   their were no other options at all.

I was blessed to follow my dreams and became an actor  booked  a few gigs in Hollywood,directed a few plays for kids that toured worked at some production companies and some dance companies , but ultimately  I knew education was the key for anybody who wanted to go any where in life. 
 I had struggles indeed  like when my parents passed away due to a sudden illness,but the one thing I knew for sure the arts helped me achieve my goals and I know its the answer for todays "RightNow" generation of kids  who cant keep their heads out of the video games and cell phones.

By Supporting our cause a Contributor will be the voice for the invisible voices of kids and families who have not been heard. A contributor to our cause will open doors that our current political stance  here in America is trying to shut. 
Every voice counts, Every dime counts and every kid deserves a chance to perform and realize that their imagination can be just powerful enough to send them to college , open up an new innovative business in their  own communities and show what love for one another looks like.

Also all contributors will receive a private copy of all 4 episodes on a hard drive as well and get a special thanks in the show credits.

The Impact

Our Project has world wide value  education is the key to unlock many doors in life. Kids who take  interest in  the arts learn how to  take charge. story:
I have embarked on a new adventure to bring affordable, developmentally appropriate, high quality preschool education to every home in the U.S. through online platforms. 

 

I am in the final stages of launching my social-emotional learning (SEL) Bible focused preschool.

 

I know the pandemic has hit everyone hard financially, emotionally and physically. Kids, especially, have struggled academically, socially and emotionally. With that in mind, I have set a goal for myself to raise $1,500 for my program so that those who may be struggling financially would have access to a high quality education and enroll in my program.

 

Please consider making a donation to help bring a high quality education to all. No amount is too small! 

The Impact

My goal of $1,500 can be achieved if 30 people each gave at least $50. Your donation would help to cover their registration fee, tuition, and supplies for 7+ month(s).

Risks & Challenges

We have a short amount of time to raise all the funds we need. This campaign lasts for 8 days onl

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to donate at this time, a like, comment, and share on this fundraiser post goes a long way!! We appreciate your support!

story:
Short Summary

Aloha IndieGoGo! We're here hoping for your support in getting our business Food Bikes off the ground and running! We have a great team that are ready to get you your food early in the morning when you need it.

Henry - He's the bike guy! With his mechanical experience and muscular legs, he'll be in charge of keeping the bikes rolling as well as the speedy delivery of food to wherever it needs to go.

Fiona - Yep she's the cook! From Indonesia and a cook at the Polynesian Cultural Center she's very experienced with the fine arts of cooking. And shhh here's a secret....the foods really good!

Wesley - Our tech guy! He's going to be working on developing an app and website for our delivery service so you can sit in class and order! With his brains you'll only get the best app service possible for your best convenience.

Now that introductions are over, let’s get down to the details of our business. Our business, Food Bikes, will be providing breakfast food for students in the early morning hours between 6-10am (remember when that was early?) to help students eat a good breakfast when they don’t have time to make food themselves. We’ll start off selling breakfast burritos and if all goes good we’ll expand our menu to other delicious breakfast food. This business includes something that means a lot to each of us as showed in the introductions.

Your contributions will really be the funding for this business. All three of us our college students studying Entrepreneurship and running our own business would give us a huge advantage compared to many others in this day, Along with that you get some delicious food!

What We Need & What You Get

Funding for this project will help cover our basic start-up costs as well as costs for the first couple weeks. Our start-up costs are around $300 with a large amount of that being the bicycle to transport and deliver the food. Day to day costs would run just under $100 a day to feed 50 people. We’ll start off using some of the cooking supplies we already have, but after making some profit we’ll buy our own cooking utensils. We’re hoping to get this project completely funded otherwise this won’t be a possibility at this moment.

The Impact

We all know breakfast is the most important meal of the day, but we always skip it for one reason or another. That’s why Food Bikes is here. We help people get a good breakfast in for a low price and no work besides putting in an order with us. This helps students work better in class and focus better in the mornings which of course makes for better doctors, accountants, writers, you name it they’ll be better because they ate breakfast!

Risks & Challenges

Like every business we have our challenges. When funded we will work on getting a food permit from the state as well as other food facility permits we’ll need. Solving these should be rather simple, just a matter of getting paperwork done and getting in touch with the right people.

Challenges will be faced head on as we all have a part in this business and want to see it succeed the best it can.

Other Ways You Can Help

Can’t contribute? Share this with your friends! There’s some awesome share tools on the left hand side of the page to share on your favorite social networks! And of course we’re always open to comments and suggestions! Post any of those above in the comments section and we’ll get back to you!

Thank you for your support and contributions!

story:
"Dairy of a Broken Woman" is more than just a book! It will be a beautiful hardcover book 6x9",  that capture real life events in a single heartfelt journey that every woman on earth experience at some point in time.


Written with a woman`s experience, from a mother`s point of view, using indepth knowledge of a man`s mindset and with the budding teenager`s developmend and future in mind.



My name is Brian G. Tuzembeho , I am a fourty year old African male and I live in Namibia, in Africa. Happily married for twenty years. Being an only son with eight (8) sisters and two daugters of my own; all the trails and tribulations I witnessed women face in my journey through life moved me to capture their stories and give them a proceeding voice.

Just when you think you have heard it all, you discover SOMETHING NEW!



My campaign is focused on releasing and distributing this timeless yet eye opening book to women and men in the hope that you will all gain alternative and undescovered insight. For women I wish that your lifes will be transformed and impacted in such a way that none of you have to fall victum to the same traps and games that men-kind have been spinning since the dawn of time....intended or unintended...and for us men to change our devious ways.


  • By funding this project you will enable me to launch and start to distribute this book all over the world. To reach the thousands of women who have faced, are currently facing or is about to face their brokeness, pain, heart ache and turmoil. Peolple that just need a fresh breath of air, that ray of light called HOPE!!



This book speaks to every female heart! It teaches the teens and the young adults about the pitfalls of life, strategy of men, the lies, the games, the importance of ever single choice, of innocent dangers, the journey of recovery, finding inner peace, married life and so much more...


Written by a man for every woman! Someone who received personal insight from victims through their testimonies. This book is dedicated to every woman; written on behalf of the countless souls who never could tell their stories yet endevoured to do so in order to heal and help others that cannot help themselves!



What I Need: I need about U$ 17 000 to publish and launch the first  thousand (1 000) copies of this hardcover book. This is at a cost of U$ 17.00 per hardcover book.  Cost includes editing, interior book design and layout as well as finishing and printing.

I have chosen to work with one of the finest companies in the United States to ensure fast distribution and control of the quality of the book!




  • I wrote this book because I was moved by the way so many women suffer at the hands of the ones they love, who also claim to love them. I noticed that mostly all the emotional and physical abuse just passes by unnoticed. Everyone is silent...until it happens to them or to their love ones than only do they wish to act.


  • This book is long overdue. Someone should have written it already and it should have been a woman. But just maybe...a man can tell it better since mostly we happen to be the authors of this pain and suffering.



  • This is a mesmerising tale, based on real facts of life and true experiences that explains a woman`s journey from an innocent childhood filled with dreams to broken adulthood filled with regret. Discover the real truth about countless women who failed to reach their destinies and why they failed!


Emotional Roller Coaster

If you battle with depression, unable to forgive, sleepless nights, heartbroken than this book is for you! Suffering with an addiction, living as a lady of the night, a gold-digger, living with an unwanted pregnancy, are you the mistress? Than you need to read this book! If you had countless relationships in search of love, are you his booty call, living with him for years and no prospect of marriage than Madam this book will open your eyes to a new frontier. Want to know how men really think and what you can learn from the way they behave in...THIS BOOK IS FOR YOU!



A lesson for every Woman, Teen and Girl!


MOTHERS, this is a phenomenal  tool you can use to educate your daughter about men, relationships, love, heartbreak, an unwanted pregnancy, single parenthood, alcohol and drugs, broken dreams and so much more! You do not have to utter a single word, the book will speak on behalf of you.


THIS BOOK IS FOR YOU...it is for YOUR sister, YOUR best friend, YOUR DAUGHTER, YOUR MOM, YOUR COUSIN!  THIS BOOK IS FOR EVERY WOMAN YOU CARE ABOUT, EVERY WOMAN YOU WISH TO PROTECT AND LOVE!



This I know! That if ever there was a time for women to rise up, it is NOW! All future generations are at stake. Teen pregnancies, STD`s, Rape Cases, Unwanted pregnancies, drug addictions, murders, abuse and so much more at the order of the day! Will women unite under one voice? Will they stand to have THE VOICE OF ALL WOMEN heard? Perhaps even in the pages of one book?

Can women truly unite across the globe for one single purpose? Can they rise as ONE with ONE voice?

If you could reach just one soul, safe one girl and prevent her from making the same dreaded decisions so many ladies regret across the globe, wouldn`t you?!  

Would you look pass the age of time and space and your own needs and desires and stand up for every baby girl, every young teen, every future Woman? Would you do for them what NO ONE did for you? Open their eyes! Be the voice that guide them and help them find their true purpose. Or empower them to empower others just like you were empowered by those who came before you. Empower them in the way you wished someone could have empowered you. Would you be the difference so many hope for? Be their beacon of hope, their ray of light in the darkness of this abyss and uncertain world?

DO YOU REALLY CARE? IF YOU DO...


BE THE FIRST TO FUND THIS BOOK! DO NOT WAIT FOR OTHERS TO TAKE THE LEAD SINCE JUST LIKE YOU THEY ALSO WAIT FOR OTHERS TO TAKE THAT LEAP OF FAITH!


If you cannot help with funding you can still do alot! All is not lost! I humbly implore you to  just make some noise and spread the word about my campaign. Thank you for taking a stand and becoming the change this generation so desperately need! Please do make use of the Indiegogo share tools if you choose to only share!
