IF YOU DO...BE THE FIRST TO FUND THIS BOOK! DO NOT WAIT FOR OTHERS TO TAKE THE LEAD SINCE JUST LIKE YOU THEY ALSO WAIT FOR OTHERS TO TAKE THAT LEAP OF FAITH! If you cannot help with funding you can still do alot! All is not lost! I humbly implore you to  just make some noise and spread the word about my campaign. Thank you for taking a stand and becoming the change this generation so desperately need! Please do make use of the Indiegogo share tools if you choose to only share!

story:
About Me and Imprinted Souls 

My name is Vivian Parham, founder and CEO of Imprinted Souls, LLC. I started Imprinted Souls Radio at 16, and realized that the online outreach was a very powerful way to help people cope with every day problems. Eventually, I wanted to reach further than just online platforms. We are now developing into a revolutionary humanitarian company that connects media, the arts and acts of philanthropy to benefit communities that need support. 25% of our revenue will be dedicated to a community or cause quarterly. 

Mission: utilizing entertainment as a catalyst for support and service to communities.

Business Model: 

Why? To give support to communities and deliver authentic entertainment 

How? By merging philanthropy and entertainment

What? We deliver radio, clothing, events, and service in which all actions have a purpose that serves the people.

This is so important to me because I came from a place that did not offer support for my creativity and differences that made me stand out to people around me. Because of my past, I can see the needs of others in communities. I'm hoping to connect with all of those communities to bring light on what we can do for them. 

What We Need & What You Get

To be as transparent as possible, our start up costs are $40,000. I am only asking for $500 initially. The $500 will go towards our first community event and samples for Imprinted Clothing. I want to be able to show people what the start of this amazing company will be, and with that I will be able to provide a visual for what we can and will do.

By donating to us, you are not only improving the community, you are providing  a way for a genuine company to make a difference. Aside from the ways that you will be benefiting Imprinted Souls, you are essentially fueling my life purpose. I have never felt stronger about anything in my life since I was 15 years old. Imprinted Souls as a company represents who I am as a person, my passions and purpose. I hope being able to impact someone's life is as meaningful to you as it is me. Donations over $20 will receive exclusives and merchandise from Imprinted Souls. 

The Impact

Your donation means being able to shift societal views. Imprinted clothing is a contribution to self love, acceptance and feeling powerful in what you choose to wear, while our entertaining events make it possible to fund and bring awareness to causes and needs of communities while having fun doing it.

Risks & Challenges

Obviously, there are some risks in the business.  Here they are:

1. Certain areas for events may not have the turn out that we want. I understand that and have planned accordingly. We will be prepared for a small 20-50 people turn out for the first few events. I am reaching out for support in Nashville and surrounding areas from businesses and organizations that can help with promotion for a good cause. 

2. Clothing costs, shipping, and volunteers. I am a single member within my company and we thrive from the support and volunteers of others. The clothing to begin with is designed by me and I handle all ordering, financial and shipping duties. I invest my own money into majority of the costs, order all product and also ship them out. I will need help in those three areas, which may cause some lag in the customer's experience until I have more help. I am currently looking for volunteers and I am seeing a good response rate. 

3. Marketing and buzz. I have a rapport with many of our supporters because of word of mouth/ grass roots marketing and I do not currently pay for any advertising. Sales will be based on buzz until advertising can be budgeted. We do have awesome supporters who are always assisting us with this and I am confident that will be enough to start with. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Volunteering, no matter where you live is always awesome. I travel often and enjoy doing work in other places as well so if you have ideas or a need in your community, let us know! Another great way to get involved is to get active in our social media. 

Contact info: 

contact@imprintedsouls.com

Twitter: Imprintedsouls_ , Facebook: Imprinted Souls ( Veemo Starr is mine)

story:
The Chinese Word Stem Theory Retrieval Manual

The Chinese Word Stem Theory Retrieval Manual was created by my self in 2001 consulting <<汉语大字典>>by ten years research , more than 20,000 GBK Chinese words computer code sorting developmant according to mathematical logic. The searching of it's Father Stem Table only need two step, the pronunciation of stem and radical. The speed of searching is even superior to English. There is no such Table and method in Chinese history.Now I am nearly 60 years old, I hope the manual will help globle people simplify Chinese learning. If I don't put forward the theory, maybe it will be effaced by time.

汉语字根理论检索手册

汉语字根理论检索手册是我认真参照<<汉语大字典>>，历时十年以上通过对两万多GBK 汉字进行分析研究，根据数理逻辑理论，利用计算机编码排序技术对汉字五千年来演变、发展、派生、传承等关系和过程进行高度概括和论证于2001年完成的沥 血之作。它的父根排序表的检索只需两步，字根读音，部首读音。不需要数笔画，大大减轻脑力开销。节约时间。数千年来没有过这样的检索表，也没有比这更快速高效的汉字检索方法。它的检索速度甚至优于英文。现在我已经快六十岁了，我希望该手册能够帮助各国学生简化汉语的学习过程。我担心如果再不推广这项理论，也许它就会被时间所埋没。

The princeple by Example

原理的实例解释

The princeple of the theory can be understood by the following cluster words relation of ancestor word stem ‘勹’：

该理论的原理可以通过‘勹’字根下字丛间的关系来理解：

Ancestor word stem ‘勹’derive the following chinese word:

祖字根‘勹’派生出如下汉字：

勺、句、匊、勿、旬、包、勾、匀、匆


The Chinese word ‘勺' as next grade stem derive the following Chinese word again
汉字‘勺'又作为下级字根排生出下列汉字：
  趵、豹、瓝、仢、靮、馰、旳、肑、玓、钓、釣、扚、訋、魡、虳、尦、尥、芍、杓、妁、礿、灼、犳、彴、汋、圴、酌、约、的

The Chinese word ‘句’ as next grade stem derive the following Chinese word again
汉字‘句’又作为下级字根排生出下列汉字：
  齣、痀、蚼、够、鉤、耇、耉、耈、枸、狗、佝、岣、坸、訽、袧、玽、豿、笱、雊、齁、豞、茍、驹、駒、眗、拘、泃、邭、鮈、跔、敂、怐、軥、斪、劬、竘、鸲、鴝、絇、鼩、朐、朐、呴、姁、欨、苟

The Chinese word‘匊’ as next grade stem derive the following Chinese word again
汉字‘匊’又作为下级字根排生出下列汉字：
  菊、陱、鞠、毱、粷、椈、鵴、婅、躹、掬、淗、諊、趜、踘、麹

The Chinese word‘勿’as next grade stem derive the following Chinese word again
  汉字‘勿’又作为下级字根排生出下列汉字：
  匢、昒、囫、歾、圽、魩、刎、吻、肳、芴、粅、物、伆、岉、沕、笏、曶、忽

The Chinese word‘旬’as next grade stem derive the following Chinese word again
   汉字‘旬’又作为下级字根排生出下列汉字：
  荀、槆、銁、銞、咰、绚、絢、殉、駨、毥、眴、栒、姰、狥、侚、徇、峋、洵、恂、询、詢、郇、珣、迿、箰、筍

The Chinese word‘包’as next grade stem derive the following Chinese word again
汉字‘包’又作为下级字根排生出下列汉字：
  泡、髱、苞、齙、蚫、骲、铇、鉋、枹、佨、饱、飽、抱、怉、窇、袌、胞、雹、鲍、鮑、孢、笣、飑、颮、玸、疱、刨、靤、鞄、瓟、庖、炮、炰、咆、匏、麅、麭、皰、狍、砲、垉、袍、跑、爮

The Chinese word‘勾’as next grade stem derive the following Chinese word again
   汉字‘勾’又作为下级字根排生出下列汉字：
  购、芶、钩、鈎、构、沟、抅

The Chinese word‘匀’as next grade stem derive the following Chinese word again
  汉字‘匀’又作为下级字根排生出下列汉字：
  蚐、钧、鈞、呁、汮、均、袀、盷、昀、抣、畇、韵

The Chinese word‘的’as next grade stem derive the following Chinese word again
   汉字‘的’又作为下级字根排生出下列汉字：
  啲、菂

The Chinese word‘均’as next grade stem derive the following Chinese word again
汉字‘均’又作为下级字根排生出下列汉字：
  筠、荺、鋆

The Chinese word‘苟’as next grade stem derive the following Chinese word again
   汉字‘苟’又作为下级字根排生出汉字‘敬’

The Chinese word‘敬’as next grade stem derive the following Chinese word again
   汉字‘敬’又作为下级字根排生出下列汉字：
  蟼、驚、儆、曔、憼、警、璥、檠、擏、擎

The Chinese word‘匆’as next grade stem derive the following Chinese word again
   汉字‘匆’又作为下级字根排生出下列汉字：
  茐、怱

The Chinese word‘怱’as next grade stem derive the following Chinese word again
   汉字‘怱’又作为下级字根排生出下列汉字：
  聦、鍯、騘、楤、緫、愡、牎、揔、偬、葱

The Chinese word‘葱’as next grade stem derive the following Chinese word again
   汉字‘葱’又作为下级字根排生出下列汉字：
     繱、檧、濍、憽、燪

All the cluster Chinese word of ‘勹’ means that each Chinese word has a deriveing relation with another.
祖字根‘勹’派生出的全部汉字，说明每个汉字之间存在着派生遗传的关系。


The Table of Manual

手册表

The Chinese Word Stem Theory Retrieval Manual include The GBK Chinese Word Stem Relation Table of Ancestor Chinese Stem Sorting and The GBK Chinese Word Stem Relation Table of Father Chinese Stem Sorting. Each table has 476 pages. The Manual has about 1000 pages.

汉语字根理论检索手册包含祖字根排序的GBK汉字与字根读音关系表及父字根排序的GBK汉字与字根读音关系表两部分。每个表为476页，整个手册大约1000页。

The first page of The GBK Chinese Word Stem RelationTable of Ancestor Chinese Stem Sorting   

祖字根排序的GBK汉字与字根读音关系表首页：


The first page of The GBK Chinese Word Stem RelationTable of Father Chinese Stem Sorting

父字根排序的GBK汉字与字根读音关系表首页：

The Chinese Stem Law

汉语字根定理

The Chinese Stem Law is created by myself depend on my research. It is defined as four laws as follow:
汉语字根定理是由本人根据自己的研究结果创立的。他由如下四个定理定义：
The Chinese Word First Law of Chinese Stem Theory:
Any chinese word include two part: The Word Stem and Radical.
                            Z=G.B
      (  Z indicate Chinese Word,   G indicate Chinese Stem,  B indicate Radical)
       if B=0, Z means true word, if B\=0 Z means complex word. The Chinese word can be both The Stem and Radical.
汉语字根理论的汉字第一定理：
任何汉字由一个字根和一个部首两部分组成。部首为零是真字，部首非零为复字。汉字既可以是字根，也可以是部首。
  Z=G.B

注: Z 表示汉字，G 表示字根，B 表示部首。

The Chinese Word Second Law of Chinese Stem Theory:
As any word combined with radical form a new word, the word is the stem of the new word. The new word is the successor of the stem. The stem of nonzero successor is a true stem, the stem of zero successor is  a false stem. The true stem can be called complex word, the false stem can be called true word.
 The stem mainly function as accordatura, means that the rhyme of new word similar to the rhyme of the stem. The stem can not be zero. The stem can be devided as Ancestor Stem and Father Stem. The Ancestor stem originated from hieroglyphic, the father stem is true stem of new word.

                  G=Z
汉语字根理论的汉字第二定理:
任何汉字只要和部首构成新的汉字，则该汉字是所构新汉字的字根。
新构汉字是该字根的后继。后继非零的字根称为真字根，后继为零
的字根称为伪字根。真字根又叫做复字，伪字根又叫做真字。
字根在汉字中主要起定音作用，即所构新汉字与该字根之间一般存
在着韵或声（主要为韵）的相似性。字根不能为零。字根又分祖字
根和父字根；祖字根一般原于象形文字，父字根就是所构汉字的真
字根。
             G=Z
The Chinese Word Third Law of Chinese Stem Theory:
The rest of word except the stem is called the radical. The radical mainly function as classification by meaning of word. The meaning of word generally confine in the range of radical meaning. The radical can be zero.

             B=Z|nul                                   B indicate Radical     Z indicate Chinese Word

汉语字根理论的汉字第三定理：
在汉字中除字根外的剩余部分被称为部首。部首在汉字中主要起字义的分类作用。汉字字义一般属于其部首字意定义的范畴。部首可以为零。

  B=Z|nul

注: Z 表示汉字，G 表示字根，B 表示部首。

The Chinese Word Stem Deriving Law (Sorting Law)of Chinese Stem Theory:
Any human language follow the thinking logic of finalizing the design after the accordatura. The derive logic of Chinese Word is based on Stem, and make radical as decoration. The Stem is main sorting factor, and the radical is the second sorting factor.

汉语字根理论的字根传承定理：（排序定理）
任何人类语言文字均遵循先定音后定型的思维逻辑。汉语的传承派生逻辑是以字根为主干，以部首为装饰。汉字字根是主排序因子。部首是次排序因子。

Retrieval Application of Father Stem Table

For Chinese word study, every body is on the road of learning. No body can pronunciate all the Chinese word cerrectly. All of us are Agan. No body can laugh at other. But we can pronunciate 90% of Stem cerrectly. So for any unknow Chinese word, first search the stem by its pronunciation. The range of searching can be reduced to the range of 20 word about.Then search the word by its pronunciation of radical can quickly find the word. The searching of Father Stem Table only need two step, the pronunciation of stem and radical. The speed of searching is even superior to English. There is no such Table and method in Chinese history.
If you do not know the pronunciation of stem, you can search the stem of stem and so on.

父根排序表的检索作用

对汉字的学习而言，我们任何人始终都处在学习的过程中。没有一个人能准确的读出每个汉字的读音。大家都是别字先生，没有人可以嘲笑他人。但90%的字根我们是可以读出的。所以，对任何不认识的汉字，首先按字根的读音查找字根，可以立即将汉字的查找范围缩小到20个以内的范围。再在同样字根范围内根据部首的读音就可迅速找到要查的汉字。表中给出了汉字的读音。结合电子字典或其它辞书字典可以找到要查的汉字解释。父根排序表的检索只需两步，字根读音，部首读音。不需要数笔画，大大减轻脑力开销。节约时间。数千年来没有过这样的检索表，也没有比这更快速高效的汉字检索方法。它的检索速度甚至优于英文。


Relation Function of Ancestor Stem Table

Ancestor Stem table mainly use as a research manual to analyze the relation of words, the historical evolutive procedure of  Chinese word, the word relation with the region and dialect, and improve the bility of  words memory by cluster remembering

祖根排序表的关系作用

祖根排序表主要用在分析汉字与汉字之间的关系、汉字的历史演变过程、汉字与地区及方言的关系上，用作研究，以及使用丛式记忆法提高个人汉字的记忆能力上。

So The Chinese Word Stem Theory Retrieval Mamaul can save your sorting time, reduce the presure of remembering, greatly accelerate your Chinese study.

所以，汉语字根理论检索手册会节省你的查找时间、降低记忆汉字的压力、加速你学习汉语的进度。


You Help Me and I Help You

I need $100000usd funding at least, and build a Chinese research and dictionary press coporation in New York to popularize the Theory global

The Chinese Word Stem Theory Retrieval Mamaul as my perk is the unique of the world since 2000 years ago. It will greatly improve the understanding of Chinese for any body, especially for the person with the mother tongue of Indo-European.

If I don't reach my entire goal, I will build my press coporation in New York as well.

The Work Oringinated From Hard Working

Now day, there is almost no such people, like inventors of hundred years ago, spend his ten years time to do research independently. I am such a man.
Your contribution will greatly improve the relation of Chinese and other nations.

Other Ways You Can Help

Whatever you contribute or not, read this page again and again will also improve knowledge of Chinese Word Stem theory

  • Please get the word out and make some noise about my campaign.
  • And use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

The Chinese word ‘句’ as next grade stem derive the following Chinese word again汉字‘句’又作为下级字根排生出下列汉字：  齣、痀、蚼、够、鉤、耇、耉、耈、枸、狗、佝、岣、坸、訽、袧、玽、豿、笱、雊、齁、豞、茍、驹、駒、眗、拘、泃、邭、鮈、跔、敂、怐、軥、斪、劬、竘、鸲、鴝、絇、鼩、朐、朐、呴、姁、欨、苟
The Chinese word‘匊’ as next grade stem derive the following Chinese word again汉字‘匊’又作为下级字根排生出下列汉字：  菊、陱、鞠、毱、粷、椈、鵴、婅、躹、掬、淗、諊、趜、踘、麹
The Chinese word‘勿’as next grade stem derive the following Chinese word again  汉字‘勿’又作为下级字根排生出下列汉字：  匢、昒、囫、歾、圽、魩、刎、吻、肳、芴、粅、物、伆、岉、沕、笏、曶、忽
The Chinese word‘旬’as next grade stem derive the following Chinese word again   汉字‘旬’又作为下级字根排生出下列汉字：  荀、槆、銁、銞、咰、绚、絢、殉、駨、毥、眴、栒、姰、狥、侚、徇、峋、洵、恂、询、詢、郇、珣、迿、箰、筍
The Chinese word‘包’as next grade stem derive the following Chinese word again汉字‘包’又作为下级字根排生出下列汉字：  泡、髱、苞、齙、蚫、骲、铇、鉋、枹、佨、饱、飽、抱、怉、窇、袌、胞、雹、鲍、鮑、孢、笣、飑、颮、玸、疱、刨、靤、鞄、瓟、庖、炮、炰、咆、匏、麅、麭、皰、狍、砲、垉、袍、跑、爮
The Chinese word‘勾’as next grade stem derive the following Chinese word again   汉字‘勾’又作为下级字根排生出下列汉字：  购、芶、钩、鈎、构、沟、抅
The Chinese word‘匀’as next grade stem derive the following Chinese word again  汉字‘匀’又作为下级字根排生出下列汉字：  蚐、钧、鈞、呁、汮、均、袀、盷、昀、抣、畇、韵
The Chinese word‘的’as next grade stem derive the following Chinese word again   汉字‘的’又作为下级字根排生出下列汉字：  啲、菂
The Chinese word‘均’as next grade stem derive the following Chinese word again汉字‘均’又作为下级字根排生出下列汉字：  筠、荺、鋆
The Chinese word‘苟’as next grade stem derive the following Chinese word again   汉字‘苟’又作为下级字根排生出汉字‘敬’
The Chinese word‘敬’as next grade stem derive the following Chinese word again   汉字‘敬’又作为下级字根排生出下列汉字：  蟼、驚、儆、曔、憼、警、璥、檠、擏、擎
The Chinese word‘匆’as next grade stem derive the following Chinese word again   汉字‘匆’又作为下级字根排生出下列汉字：  茐、怱
The Chinese word‘怱’as next grade stem derive the following Chinese word again   汉字‘怱’又作为下级字根排生出下列汉字：  聦、鍯、騘、楤、緫、愡、牎、揔、偬、葱
The Chinese word‘葱’as next grade stem derive the following Chinese word again   汉字‘葱’又作为下级字根排生出下列汉字：     繱、檧、濍、憽、燪
All the cluster Chinese word of ‘勹’ means that each Chinese word has a deriveing relation with another.祖字根‘勹’派生出的全部汉字，说明每个汉字之间存在着派生遗传的关系。


The Table of Manual
手册表
The Chinese Word Stem Theory Retrieval Manual include The GBK Chinese Word Stem Relation Table of Ancestor Chinese Stem Sorting and The GBK Chinese Word Stem Relation Table of Father Chinese Stem Sorting. Each table has 476 pages. The Manual has about 1000 pages.

汉语字根理论检索手册包含祖字根排序的GBK汉字与字根读音关系表及父字根排序的GBK汉字与字根读音关系表两部分。每个表为476页，整个手册大约1000页。
The first page of The GBK Chinese Word Stem RelationTable of Ancestor Chinese Stem Sorting   
祖字根排序的GBK汉字与字根读音关系表首页：

The first page of The GBK Chinese Word Stem RelationTable of Father Chinese Stem Sorting父字根排序的GBK汉字与字根读音关系表首页：
The Chinese Stem Law
汉语字根定理
The Chinese Stem Law is created by myself depend on my research. It is defined as four laws as follow:汉语字根定理是由本人根据自己的研究结果创立的。他由如下四个定理定义：The Chinese Word First Law of Chinese Stem Theory:Any chinese word include two part: The Word Stem and Radical.                            Z=G.B      (  Z indicate Chinese Word,   G indicate Chinese Stem,  B indicate Radical)       if B=0, Z means true word, if B\=0 Z means complex word. The Chinese word can be both The Stem and Radical.汉语字根理论的汉字第一定理：任何汉字由一个字根和一个部首两部分组成。部首为零是真字，部首非零为复字。汉字既可以是字根，也可以是部首。  Z=G.B注: Z 表示汉字，G 表示字根，B 表示部首。The Chinese Word Second Law of Chinese Stem Theory:As any word combined with radical form a new word, the word is the stem of the new word. The new word is the successor of the stem. The stem of nonzero successor is a true stem, the stem of zero successor is  a false stem. The true stem can be called complex word, the false stem can be called true word. The stem mainly function as accordatura, means that the rhyme of new word similar to the rhyme of the stem. The stem can not be zero. The stem can be devided as Ancestor Stem and Father Stem. The Ancestor stem originated from hieroglyphic, the father stem is true stem of new word.                  G=Z汉语字根理论的汉字第二定理:任何汉字只要和部首构成新的汉字，则该汉字是所构新汉字的字根。新构汉字是该字根的后继。后继非零的字根称为真字根，后继为零的字根称为伪字根。真字根又叫做复字，伪字根又叫做真字。字根在汉字中主要起定音作用，即所构新汉字与该字根之间一般存在着韵或声（主要为韵）的相似性。字根不能为零。字根又分祖字根和父字根；祖字根一般原于象形文字，父字根就是所构汉字的真字根。             G=ZThe Chinese Word Third Law of Chinese Stem Theory:The rest of word except the stem is called the radical. The radical mainly function as classification by meaning of word. The meaning of word generally confine in the range of radical meaning. The radical can be zero.             B=Z|nul                                   B indicate Radical     Z indicate Chinese Word汉语字根理论的汉字第三定理：在汉字中除字根外的剩余部分被称为部首。部首在汉字中主要起字义的分类作用。汉字字义一般属于其部首字意定义的范畴。部首可以为零。  B=Z|nul注: Z 表示汉字，G 表示字根，B 表示部首。The Chinese Word Stem Deriving Law (Sorting Law)of Chinese Stem Theory:Any human language follow the thinking logic of finalizing the design after the accordatura. The derive logic of Chinese Word is based on Stem, and make radical as decoration. The Stem is main sorting factor, and the radical is the second sorting factor.汉语字根理论的字根传承定理：（排序定理）任何人类语言文字均遵循先定音后定型的思维逻辑。汉语的传承派生逻辑是以字根为主干，以部首为装饰。汉字字根是主排序因子。部首是次排序因子。Retrieval Application of Father Stem Table

For Chinese word study, every body is on the road of learning. No body can pronunciate all the Chinese word cerrectly. All of us are Agan. No body can laugh at other. But we can pronunciate 90% of Stem cerrectly. So for any unknow Chinese word, first search the stem by its pronunciation. The range of searching can be reduced to the range of 20 word about.Then search the word by its pronunciation of radical can quickly find the word. The searching of Father Stem Table only need two step, the pronunciation of stem and radical. The speed of searching is even superior to English. There is no such Table and method in Chinese history.If you do not know the pronunciation of stem, you can search the stem of stem and so on.父根排序表的检索作用
对汉字的学习而言，我们任何人始终都处在学习的过程中。没有一个人能准确的读出每个汉字的读音。大家都是别字先生，没有人可以嘲笑他人。但90%的字根我们是可以读出的。所以，对任何不认识的汉字，首先按字根的读音查找字根，可以立即将汉字的查找范围缩小到20个以内的范围。再在同样字根范围内根据部首的读音就可迅速找到要查的汉字。表中给出了汉字的读音。结合电子字典或其它辞书字典可以找到要查的汉字解释。父根排序表的检索只需两步，字根读音，部首读音。不需要数笔画，大大减轻脑力开销。节约时间。数千年来没有过这样的检索表，也没有比这更快速高效的汉字检索方法。它的检索速度甚至优于英文。
Relation Function of Ancestor Stem Table
Ancestor Stem table mainly use as a research manual to analyze the relation of words, the historical evolutive procedure of  Chinese word, the word relation with the region and dialect, and improve the bility of  words memory by cluster remembering
祖根排序表的关系作用
祖根排序表主要用在分析汉字与汉字之间的关系、汉字的历史演变过程、汉字与地区及方言的关系上，用作研究，以及使用丛式记忆法提高个人汉字的记忆能力上。
So The Chinese Word Stem Theory Retrieval Mamaul can save your sorting time, reduce the presure of remembering, greatly accelerate your Chinese study.
所以，汉语字根理论检索手册会节省你的查找时间、降低记忆汉字的压力、加速你学习汉语的进度。    You Help Me and I Help You

I need $100000usd funding at least, and build a Chinese research and dictionary press coporation in New York to popularize the Theory global
The Chinese Word Stem Theory Retrieval Mamaul as my perk is the unique of the world since 2000 years ago. It will greatly improve the understanding of Chinese for any body, especially for the person with the mother tongue of Indo-European.
If I don't reach my entire goal, I will build my press coporation in New York as well. 
The Work Oringinated From Hard Working
Now day, there is almost no such people, like inventors of hundred years ago, spend his ten years time to do research independently. I am such a man. Your contribution will greatly improve the relation of Chinese and other nations.
 Other Ways You Can Help Whatever you contribute or not, read this page again and again will also improve knowledge of Chinese Word Stem theory  Please get the word out and make some noise about my campaign. And use the Indiegogo share tools!   And that's all there is to it.

story:
Summary


I was so passionate about finding Meaning of Life, that I had studied this topic for years. I've found really good answers to this forever asked question, about the sense of existence.

I think it's really important to have a sense of meaning in life and it's important for everybody. I want to share what I have discovered, with the world and Your sharing further would be very helpful in doing so.

To make a good quality film it's needed to but some good video shots, music,  make computer stronger so it won't hang up while producing film and license for proper video programs .

Personally I am a coach, trainer, activist from non-government sector and privately I am passionate about life philosophy and the way the Universe works, especially WHY it works this way. I've finished a course on film making, where I was practically taking part in few roles as sound specialist, actor, camera operator and film director.


What We Need

From my counting $5600 would be enough for the project, that's why it's set as a goal.

If the amount won't be reached, I do my best to still realize the film, but probably it's quality will be lower by then, with less or worse materials bought. I want to make that film to contribute this way to the life of others.

I did the short video about the project (the one on youtube) for free with free materials, so something is possible that way, but those possibilities are limited, for example the databases of open-source video shots or music are not big, so it's better to use also the bought ones.


    Impact

    Film will be uploaded and offered for free to everyone on Internet under non-commercial use license. I have a little hope that commercial use might help to finance other future film production similar to this one. I hope to make subtitles in few languages, Spanish, Russian, Arabic, Chinese and maybe more with help of volunteers.

    I deeply hope that many people will find the film inspiring and somehow help them find their meaning in their life's.

    I plan to make a short teaser version and the full version of the film, both of them should be ready in November 2013 the latest.

    Risks & Challenges

    The challenge will be to promote the Film after it's done, but I hope that if I would succeed in this Indiegogo project with promotion then also I will succeed with the promotion of the final Film. The better it will be, the easier it will be to make it go viral in Internet.

    I think that the film production challenges will be easy to overcome as I know a some professional filmmakers in my city and I can approach them and asks for details or for help.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Some technical help with film making would be helpful, for example in preparing some animations or special effects. I would also appreciate help in consulting the plot, the content and plan of promotion of the final version and also in sharing this Indiegogo campaign and the Film itself!

story:
Thank you everyone who helped us complete our first episode! In this campaign we are seeking funds to translate the film into multiple foreign languages, create voice-overs and closed captions files for each translation, pay for duplication services, and hire a publicity agent to build awareness of the film, and help us find a distibutor.

Many people are simply unaware of the growing movement within the scientific community to embrace the concept of a creator. Because our unique film series is science-based (rather than denomination-specific), we can address the widest possible audience - even in a public school setting.

We are a small, non-profit (501c3) dedicated to building a consensus on the reality of God.  Please enjoy the show and help us spread the word.

"Supremely interesting, compelling, fantastic!" - David Hoffman, Producer: Cannes Film Festival Critics Prize Winner 

“What an incredible film! Fascinating, mind-bending stuff.” - Timothy Rhys, Publisher: MovieMaker Magazine

"By far the best video I have watched on this topic, bar none." - Prof. Brian Whitworth, Systems Analysis: Massey University

story:
Hi all, 

I am Rahul Mall, a resident of Kathmandu, Nepal. We are all aware of the incidents of 25th April and how scary it was the destruction its caused in Nepal. By god's grace me and my family and most of our loved ones are all safe but there are many who have lost their loved ones and their homes. 

Loved ones cannot be brought back but homes can be rebuilt and it can be built stronger! 

The current situation: (on a tour of the city- rough figures):- 

50% of the houses have demolished
30% are highly damaged that its risky and scary to stay in
and the remaining 20% can be resided in with some repairs. 

Our family plans on helping these families rebuild their homes. With the funds collected we plan on providing families with materials to build homes and expertise if they accede to it. 

Thank You. 

Love from Nepal.

story:
Hi ! My name is Artem, I'm an engineer - designer, I invented  a UNIQUE UltraViolet  glass for forks, spoons and knives !

Write me on email or facebook, will answer all of your questions!

Protect yourself and your loved ones from harmful GERMs !


The bactericidal action of ultraviolet rays was discovered about 100 years ago. The first laboratory testing of UVGI in the 1920s were so promising that the total elimination of airborne infections was seemed possible in the near future. UVGI has been actively used since the 1930s and in 1936 it was first used to sterilize air in a surgical operating room. In 1937, the first application of UVGI in the ventilation system of one of the American schools impressively reduced the incidence of morbidity of students of measles and other infections. Then it seemed that has found a wonderful way to combat airborne infections. However, further study of UVGI and dangerous side effects seriously narrowed the possibility of use it in the presence of people.

                                               

The power of penetration of the ultraviolet rays is small and they are distributed only in a straight line, i.e. there are a lot of shaded areas in any working premise that are not affected by a bactericidal treatment. With distance from the source of ultraviolet radiation its biocidal action is sharply reduced. The radiation effect is limited of the surface of the irradiated object.

UVGI irradiation is lethal for most aquatic bacteria, viruses, spores and protozoa. It destroys the causative agents of infectious diseases, such as typhoid, cholera, dysentery, viral hepatitis, polio, etc. Use of ultraviolet radiation allows achieve a more effective disinfection than chlorination, particularly against viruses.

Have you ever thought that bacteria and germs are living in the neighborhood of you? And most interestingly: a favorite place of dislocation of these unexpected friends is nothing else than your kitchen. Yes, invisible microorganisms lurk even behind the apparent perfect purity. They sit on your cutting board, look to your refrigerator and settle on the sponge for washing dishes. Therefore, in order to protect yourself and your family from tiny enemies, it is necessary to disinfect the cutlery, because even after washing, the microorganisms remain on it and penetrate into your body upon contact the cutlery with your mouth!

A favorite place of dances of bacteria is a kitchen towel. The risk is not high until you didn't wipe with it a next cutlery. But once you did it: wiped fork, spoon, knife, and then wiped the surface of the table, all ready the soil for reproduction of microorganisms prepared. Therefore, we recommend you first wash and dry, and then sure to handle!

                             


Funds raised here will go to wards the development of the company, the project aims to secure a daily use in your home to maintain the health of you and your family!

                                


My invention is made of an ultraviolet lamp and is adapted to mesh with the inner glass wall.
Please help collect with the world on a string for my bright ideas!

UV glass is completely safe! Long wavelength 400nm !
